S04bsu022_u:1071: rājñā capi śuddhodanena manuṣyātikrāntaṃ divyāsaṃprāptaṃ gṛhataraṃ pratisaṃskāritamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1072: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāvyūhasya samādheranubhāvena sarveṣu teṣu gṛheṣu māyādevīmupadarśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1073: abhyantaragataśca bodhisattvo māyādevyāḥ kukṣau dakṣiṇe pārśve paryaṅkamābhujya niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1074: sarve ca te deveśvarā ekaikamevaṃ saṃjānīte sma - mamaiva gṛhe bodhisattvamātā prativasati nānyatreti //
S04bsu022_u:1077: mahāvyūhāya sthitaḥ samādhiye acintiyā nirmita nirmiṇitvā /
S04bsu022_u:1078: sarveṣa devānabhiprāya pūritā nṛpasya pūrṇaśca tadā manorathaḥ // Lal_6.22 //
S04bsu022_u:1079: atha khalu tasyāṃ devaparṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - ye 'pi tāvaccāturmahārājakāyikā devāste 'pi tāvanmanuṣyāśrayagatatvena nirvidyāpakramanti /
S04bsu022_u:1080: kaḥ punarvādo ye tadanye udāratamā devāḥ trāyatriṃśā vā yāmā vā tuṣitā vā /
S04bsu022_u:1081: tatkathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bodhisattvaḥ śucirnirāmagandhaḥ sattvaratnaḥ saṃtuṣitāddevanikāyāccyutvā durgandhe manuṣyāśraye daśamāsān mātuḥ kukṣau sthita iti //
S04bsu022_u:1082: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando buddhānubhāvena bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvajjugupsanīyaśca mātṛgrāmastathāgatenokto yāvadrāgacaritaśca /
S04bsu022_u:1084: kathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva tuṣitāddevanikāyāccyavitvā manuṣyāśraye (durgandhe)
S04bsu022_u:1087: nāhaṃ bhagavan idamutsahe evaṃ vaktaṃ yathaiva pūrve bhagavatā vyākṛtamiti /
S04bsu022_u:1088: bhagavānāha - icchasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭuṃ yo mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya paribhogo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1091: yattathāgatastaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamupadarśayed yaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ vetsyāmaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:1093: yad brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhamaṣṭaṣaṣṭibrahmaśatasahasrairbrahmaloke 'ntarhito bhagavataḥ purataḥ pratyasthāt /
S04bsu022_u:1094: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte 'sthāt prāñjalībhūto bhagavantaṃ namasyan /
S04bsu022_u:1095_0: tatra khalu bhagavān jānanneva brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāmantrayate sma - gṛhītastvayā
S04bsu022_u:1095_1: brahman sa bodhisattvaparibhogo daśamāsiko yo mama pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1101: bhagavānāha - tena hi tvaṃ brahman upadarśaya taṃ daśamāsikaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogam,
S04bsu022_u:1103: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatistān brāhmaṇānetadavocat - tiṣṭhatu tāvadbhavanto yāvadvayaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamānayiṣyāmaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:1104: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatirbhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā bhagavataḥ purato 'ntarhitastatkṣaṇameva brahmaloke pratyasthāt //
S04bsu022_u:1105: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ subrahmāṇaṃ devaputrametadavocat - gaccha tvaṃ mārṣā ito brahmalokamupādāya yāvattrāyatriṃśadbhavanam - śabdamudīraya,
S04bsu022_u:1110_0: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiścaturaśītyā devakoṭyā nayutaśatasahasraḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ ratnavyūhaṃ
S04bsu022_u:1110_1: bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ parigṛhya mahati brāhme vimāne triyojanaśatike pratiṣṭhāpyānekairdaivakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ
S04bsu022_u:1111: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ mahāsaṃnipāto 'bhūt bhagavatsakāśe gantum /
S04bsu022_u:1112: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo divyairvastrairdivyairmālyairdivyairgandhairdivyaiḥ puṣpairdivyairvādyairdivyaiśca paribhaugairabhisaṃskṛto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1113: tāvanmaheśākhyaiśca devaiḥ parivṛto 'bhūd yacchakro devānāmindraḥ sumerau(samudre)
S04bsu022_u:1114: sthitvā dūrata eva mukhe tālacchatrakaṃ dattvā śīrṣavyavalokanenānuvilokayati sma unmeṣadhyāyikayā vā /
S04bsu022_u:1120: atha khalu bhagavāṃstaṃ divyaṃ vādyanirghoṣamantardhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1121: tatkasmāt? yatsahaśravaṇādeva jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā unmādamāpatsyanta iti //
S04bsu022_u:1122: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ - kathaṃ devānāmindra kariṣyāmo na labhāmahe ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭum /
S04bsu022_u:1125: api tu khalu punarmārṣā bhagavatsamīpamupanītaṃ drakṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1126: te tadā āhuḥ - tena hi devānāmindra tathā kuru yathāsya kṣipraṃ darśanaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu022_u:1127: śakra āha - āgamayata mārṣā muhūrtaṃ yāvadatikrāntātikrāntatamā devaputrā bhagavantaṃ pratisaṃmodayante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1129: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ taiścaturaśītyā devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraistaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1130: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaścaturasraścatuṣṭhūṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1134: tasya khalu punaḥ kūtāgārasya madhye paryaṅkaḥ prajñaptaḥ tadyathāpi nāma ṣaṇmāsajātasya dārakasya bhittīphalakaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1135: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhoga evaṃ varṇasaṃsthāno yasya na kaścit sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sadṛśo 'sti ākṛtyā vā varṇena vā /
S04bsu022_u:1136: devāḥ khalvapi taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptā abhuvan /
S04bsu022_u:1138: sa ca tathāgatasyāntika upanīto 'tīva bhāsate tapati virocate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1139: tadyathāpi nāma dvinirdhāntaṃ suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa supariniṣṭhitamapagatakācadoṣam,
S04bsu022_u:1142: tasmin khalu punarbodhisattvaparibhoge paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto yasya sadevake loke nāsti kaścit sadṛśo varṇena vā saṃsthānena vā anyatra kambugrīvāyā (Vaidya 49)
S04bsu022_u:1145: tattasya bodhisattvaparyaṅkasyāgrato na bhāsate sma tadyathāpi nāma vātavṛṣṭyābhihataḥ kṛṣṇakambalaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1146: sa khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāra uragasāracandanamayo yasyaikasuvarṇadharaṇī sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ kṣamate,
S04bsu022_u:1148: tādṛśa eva dvitīyaḥ kūṭāgāraḥ kṛto yastasmin prathame kūṭāgāre 'bhyantarataḥ asakto 'baddhasthitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1149: tādṛśa eva tṛtīyo 'pi kūṭāgāro yastasmin dvitīye kūṭāgāre 'bhyantare 'sakto 'baddhasthitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1150: sa ca paryaṅkastasmin gandhamaye tṛtīye kūṭāgāre vyavasthitaḥ saṃpraticchannaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1151: tasya khalu punaruragasāracandanasyaivaṃrūpo varṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma abhijātasya nīlaivaḍūryasya /
S04bsu022_u:1152: tasya khalu punargandhakūṭāgārasyopari samantādyāvanti kāniciddivyātikrāntāni puṣpāṇi santi,
S04bsu022_u:1153: tāni sarvāṇi tasmin kūṭāgāre bodhisattvasya pūrvakuśalamūlavipākenānuprāptānyeva jāyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1154: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo dṛḍhasāro 'bhedyo vajropamaḥ sparśena ca kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1155: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge ye kecit kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ bhavanavyūhāste sarve tasmin saṃdṛśyante sma //
S04bsu022_u:1156: yāmeva ca rātriṃ bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāntastāmeva rātrimadha āpaskandhamupādāya aṣṭaṣaṣṭiyojanaśatasahasrāṇi mahāpṛthivīṃ bhittvā yāvad brahmalokaṃ padmabhyudgatamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1157: na ca kaścittaṃ padmaṃ paśyati sma anyatra sārathinarottamāddaśaśatasāhasrikācca mahābrahmaṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1158: yacceha trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātāvojo vā maṇḍo va raso vā,
S04bsu022_u:1159: tatsarvaṃ tasmin mahāpadme madhubinduḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma //
S04bsu022_u:1160: tamenaṃ mahābrahmā śubhe vaiḍūryabhājane prakṣipya bodhisattvasyopanāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1161: taṃ bodhisattvaḥ parigṛhya bhuṅkte sma mahābrahmaṇo 'nukampāmupādāya /
S04bsu022_u:1162: nāsti sa kaścit sattvaḥ sattvanikāye yasya sa ojobinduḥ paribhuktaḥ samyak sukhena pariṇāmedanyatra caramabhavikādbodhisattvāt sarvabodhisattvabhūmiparipūrṇāt /
S04bsu022_u:1163: kasya ca karmaṇo vipākena sa ojobindurbodhisattvasyopatiṣṭhate sma?
S04bsu022_u:1164: dīrgharātraṃ khalvapi bodhisattvena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo bhaiṣajyaṃ dattamāśatparāṇāṃ sattvānāmāśāḥ paripūritāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:1166: nityaṃ cāgrapuṣpamagraphalamagrarasaṃ tathāgatebhyastathāgatacaityebhyastathāgataśrāvakasaṃghebhyo mātāpitṛbhyaśca dattvā paścādātmanā paribhuktam /
S04bsu022_u:1167: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mahābrahmā bodhisattvasya taṃ madhubindumupanāmayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1168: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre yāni kānicit santyatikrāntātikrāntāni māyāguṇaratikrīḍāsamavasṛtasthānāni,
S04bsu022_u:1169: tāni sarvāṇi tasmin prādurbhāvāni saṃdṛśyante sma bodhisattvasya pūrvakarmavipākena //
S04bsu022_u:1170: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge śatasahasravyūhaṃ nāma vāsoyugaṃ prādurbhūtam /
S04bsu022_u:1171: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yasya tatprādurbhavedanyatra caramabhavikād bodhisattvāt /
S04bsu022_u:1172: (Vaidya 50) na ca te kecana udārodārā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā ye tasmin kūṭāgāre na saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1173: sacetkūṭāgāraparibhoga evaṃ suparibhoga evaṃ supariniṣpannaḥ sāntarabahirevaṃ supariniṣṭhita evaṃ mṛdukaśca /
S04bsu022_u:1176_0: dharmatā khalveṣā bodhisattvasya pūrvakeṇa ca praṇidhānena iyaṃ cetanā ṛddhāvavaśyaṃ
S04bsu022_u:1176_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manuṣyaloka upapattavyamabhiniṣkramya cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya
S04bsu022_u:1180: na hi caramabhavikasya bodhisattvasya kalalārbudaghanapeśībhāvaṃ kāyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1181: atha tarhi sarvāṅgapratyaṅgalakṣaṇasaṃpannaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇa eva prādurbhavati /
S04bsu022_u:1182: svapnāntaragatā ca bodhisattvamātā māyādevī mahānāgakuñjaramavakrāntaṃ saṃjānīte sma //
S04bsu022_u:1183_0: tasya khalu punastathā niṣaṇṇasya śakro devānāmindraścatvāraśca mahārājāno 'ṣṭāviṃśatiśca
S04bsu022_u:1183_1: mahāyakṣasenāpatayo guhyakādhipatiśca nāma yakṣakulaṃ yato vajrapāṇerutpattiste bodhisattvaṃ
S04bsu022_u:1183_2: mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitamanubaddhā bhavanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1184: santi khalu punaścatasro bodhisattvaparicārakā devatāḥ - utkhalī ca nāma samutkhalī ca nāma dhvajavatī ca nāma prabhāvatī ca nāma /
S04bsu022_u:1185: tā api bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitaṃ rakṣanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1186: śakro 'pi devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrairdevaputraśatairbodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jñātvā satataṃ samitamanubadhnāti sma //
S04bsu022_u:1188: tadyathāpi nāma parvatamūrdhani rātrāvandhakāratamisrāyāṃ mahānagniskandho yojanādapi dṛśyate sma,
S04bsu022_u:1190: evameva bodhisattvasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛtto 'bhūt prabhāsvaro 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1191: sa tasmin kūṭāgāre paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇo 'tīva śobhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1193: bodhisattvasya mātā ca nidhyāya sthitā paśyati sma kukṣigataṃ bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:1194: tadyathāpi nāma mahato 'bhrakūṭādvidyuto niḥsṛtya mahāntamavabhāsaṃ saṃjanayanti,
S04bsu022_u:1195: evameva bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena ca taṃ prathamaṃ ratnakūṭāgāramavabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1199: tamavabhāsya yatra cāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavati sma tadavabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1201: sarvaṃ gṛhamavabhāsya gṛhasyopariṣṭānniḥsṛtya pūrvāṃ diśamavabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1202: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāṃ uttarāmadha ūrdhvaṃ samantāddaśadiśaḥ krośamātramekaikasyāṃ diśi mātuḥ kukṣigato bodhisattvaḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena cāvabhāsayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1204_0: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaścatvāro mahārājāno 'ṣṭāviṃśacca mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ
S04bsu022_u:1204_1: sārdhaṃ pañcamātrayakṣaśataiḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya
S04bsu022_u:1205: tadā bodhisattvastānāgatān viditvā dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimabhyutkṣipya ekāṅgulikayā āsanānyupadarśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1207: paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jātarūpamiva vigrahaṃ hastaṃ cālayantaṃ vicālayantam utkṣipantaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayantam /
S04bsu022_u:1209: niṣaṇṇāṃśca tān viditvā bodhisattvo dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1210: yadā ca prakramitukāmā bhavanti tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva vicintitaṃ vijñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1213: tadā teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitāḥ sma vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
S04bsu022_u:1214: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1215: ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo yadbodhisattvo rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ saṃcārya vicārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1216: vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃstaṃ pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1217: punaraparaṃ yadā bodhisattvasya keciddarśanāyāgacchanti sma striyo vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā,
S04bsu022_u:1220: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ san sattvān pratisaṃmodanakuśalo bhavati smeti /
S04bsu022_u:1221: na ca kaściddevo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā yaḥ śaknoti sma bodhisattvaṃ pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmoditum /
S04bsu022_u:1222: atha tarhi bodhisattva eva tāvat pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmodate sma,
S04bsu022_u:1224: nirgate khalu punaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye madhyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite atha khalu śakro devānāmindro niṣkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1225: abhiniṣkrāntāśca trāyatriṃśaddevaputrā bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S04bsu022_u:1227: tāṃśca bodhisattvo dūrata evāgacchato dṛṣṭvā dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ devāṃśca trāyatriṃśān pratisaṃmodate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1229: na ca śaknoti sma bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindro bodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum /
S04bsu022_u:1230: niṣīdati sma śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu /
S04bsu022_u:1231: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1232: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma,
S04bsu022_u:1234: tatasteṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma - asmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃmodate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1235: ekaikaścaivaṃ saṃjānīte sma - mayaiva sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
S04bsu022_u:1238: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre śakrasya devānāmindrasya trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ ca pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1239: na khalu punaranyatraivaṃ pariśuddho bodhisattvaparibhogo bhavati yathā mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu022_u:1240: yadā ca bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrāḥ prakramitukāmā bhavanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:1241: tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1242: saṃcārya vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1244: tadā śakrasya devānāmindrasyānyeṣāṃ ca trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
S04bsu022_u:1245: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma //
S04bsu022_u:1246_0: nirgate ca khalu punarbhikṣavo madhyāhnakālasamaye sāyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite
S04bsu022_u:1246_2: puraskṛtastaṃ divyamojobindumādāya yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmati sma bodhisattvaṃ
S04bsu022_u:1246_3: draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ dharmaṃ ca śrotum /
S04bsu022_u:1247: samanvāharati sma bhikṣavaḥ bodhisattvo brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāgacchantaṃ saparivāram /
S04bsu022_u:1248: punareva ca bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇapāṇimutkṣipya brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatiṃ brahmakāyikāṃśca devaputrān pratisaṃmodate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1250: na ca śaktirasti bhikṣavo brahmaṇaḥ sahāpaterbodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum /
S04bsu022_u:1251: niṣīdati sma bhikṣavo brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu /
S04bsu022_u:1252: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1253: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma,
S04bsu022_u:1255: tatasteṣāmekaikasyaivaṃ bhavati sma - mayā sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
S04bsu022_u:1257: yadā ca brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā gantukāmā bhavanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:1258: tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhumutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1260: saṃcārya vicārya avasādatākāreṇa pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1262: tato brahmaṇaḥ sahāpatestadanyeṣāṃ ca brahmakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
S04bsu022_u:1263: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva prakrāmanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1264: bodhisattvaśca smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1265_0: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarābhyo digbhyo 'dhastādupariṣṭāt
S04bsu022_u:1265_1: santāddaśabhyo digbhyo bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya
S04bsu022_u:1266: teṣāmāgatāgatānāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjya prabhāvyūhāni siṃhāsanānyabhinirmimīte sma /
S04bsu022_u:1268: niṣaṇṇāṃścainān viditvā paripṛcchati sma paripraśnayati sma yadutāsyaiva bodhisattvasya mahāyānasya vistaravibhāgatāmupādāya /
S04bsu022_u:1269: na ca tān kaścidanyaḥ paśyati sma anyatra sabhāgebhyo devaputrebhyaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1270: ayaṃ bhikṣavo heturayaṃ pratyayo yena bodhisattvaḥ praśāntāyāṃ rātryāṃ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1272: na khalu punarbhikṣavo māyādevī bodhisattvakukṣigate gurukāyatāṃ saṃjānīte sma anyatra laghutāmeva mṛdutāmeva saukhyatāmeva /
S04bsu022_u:1274: na ca rāgaparidāhena vā dveṣaparidāhena vā mohaparidāhena vā paridahyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1275: na ca kāmavitarkaṃ vā vyāpādavitarkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1276: na ca śītaṃ na coṣṇaṃ vā jighatsāṃ vā pipāsāṃ vā tamo vā rajo vā kleśaṃ vā saṃjānīte sma paśyati vā /
S04bsu022_u:1277: na cāsyā amanāpā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā vā ābhāsamāgacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1278: na ca pāpakān svapnān paśyati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1279: na cāsyāḥ strīmāyā na śāṭhyaṃ nerṣyā na strīkleśā bādhante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1280: pañcaśikṣāpadasamādattā khalu punaḥ śīlavatī daśakuśalakarmapathe pratiṣṭhitā tasmin samaye bodhisattvamātā bhavati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1281: na ca bodhisattvamātuḥ kvacit puruṣe rāgacittamutpadyate sma,
S04bsu022_u:1283: ye ca kecitkapilāhvaye mahāpuravare anyeṣu vā janapadeṣu devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍabhūtāviṣṭāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā vā,
S04bsu022_u:1284: te sarve bodhisattvamātuḥ sahadarśanādeva svasthāḥ smṛtipratilabdhā bhavanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1286: ye ca kecinnānārogaspṛṣṭāḥ sattvā bhavanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:1288_0: cakṣurogeṇa vā śrotrarogeṇa vā ghrāṇarogeṇa vā jihvārogeṇa vā oṣṭharogeṇa vā dantarogeṇa
S04bsu022_u:1289: teṣāṃ bodhisattvamātā dakṣiṇapāṇiṃ mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1290: te sahapratiṣṭhāpite pāṇau vigatavyādhayo bhūtvā svakasvakāni gṛhāṇi gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1291: antato māyādevī tṛṇagulmakamapi dharaṇitalādabhyutkṣipya glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo 'nuprayacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1293: yadā ca māyādevī svaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ pratyavekṣate sma,
S04bsu022_u:1295: tadyathāpi nāma supariśuddha ādarśamaṇḍale mukhamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /
S04bsu022_u:1296: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭā udagrā āttamanā pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā bhavati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1297: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mātuḥ kukṣigatasyādhiṣṭhitaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ divyāni tūryāṇi abhi(nirmāya)
S04bsu022_u:1302: kālena ṛtavo nakṣatrāṇi ca parivartante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1303: kṣemaṃ ca rājyaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sumanākulamanubhavati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1304: sarve ca kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare śākyā anye ca sattvāḥ khādanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:1312: rājāpi śuddhodanaḥ saṃprāptabrahmacaryoparatarāṣṭrakāryo 'pi supariśuddhastapovanagata iva dharmamevānuvartate sma //
S04bsu022_u:1314: evaṃrūpeṇa bhikṣava ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato 'sthāt /
S04bsu022_u:1315: tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - drakṣyasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ yatra bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato vyāhārṣīt /
S04bsu022_u:1317: darśayati sma tathāgata āyuṣmata ānandasya śakrasya devānāmindrasya caturṇāṃ ca lokapālānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ ca devamanuṣyāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:1318: dṛṣṭvā ca te tuṣṭā abhūvan udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1319: sa ca brahmā sahāpatiḥ punareva brahmaloke samāropya pratiṣṭhāpayati sma caityārtham //
S04bsu022_u:1320: tatra khalu bhagavān punarapi bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma - iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāsakukṣigatena bodhisattvena ṣaṭtriṃśannayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ triṣu yāneṣu paripācitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:1322: bodhisattva agrasattva mātukukṣisaṃsthitaḥ prakampitā ca ṣaḍvikāra medinī sakānanā /
S04bsu022_u:1323: suvarṇavarṇa ābha mukta sarvāpāya śodhitā praharṣitāśca devasaṃgha dharmagañju bheṣyate // Lal_6.23 //
S04bsu022_u:1324: suṃsaṃsthito mahāvimānu naikaratnacitrito yatra vīru āruhitva tiṣṭhate vināyakaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1325: gandhottamena candanena pūrito virocate yasyaikakarṣu trisahasramūlyaratnapūrito // Lal_6.24 //
S04bsu022_u:1326: mahāsahasralokadhātu heṣvi bhindiyitvanā udāgato guṇākarasya padmaojabinduko /
S04bsu022_u:1327: so saptarātra puṇyateja brahmaloki udgato gṛhītva brahma ojabindu bodhisattva nāmayī // Lal_6.25 //
S04bsu022_u:1328: na asti sarvasattvakāyi bhuktu yo jareya taṃ anyatra bhūri bodhisattva brahmakalpasaṃnibhe /
S04bsu022_u:1329: anekakalpa puṇyateja ojabindu saṃsthito bhujitva sattva kāyacitta jñānaśuddha gacchiṣu // Lal_6.26 //
S04bsu022_u:1330: śakra brahma lokapāla pūjanāya nāyakaṃ trīṇi kāla āgamitva bodhisattvamantikam /
S04bsu022_u:1331: vandayitva pūjayitva dharma śṛṇute varaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ karitva sarva gacchiṣū yathāgatā // Lal_6.27 //
S04bsu022_u:1336: prayānti sarvi hṛṣṭacitta varṇamāla bhāṣato // Lal_6.28 //
S04bsu022_u:1337: ye ca iṣṭidārakāsu duḥkhitā tadā abhūt bhūtaspṛṣṭa kṣiptacitta nagna pāṃśumrakṣitā /
S04bsu022_u:1338: te ca sarva dṛṣṭva māya bhonti labdhacetanā smṛtīmatīgatīupeta gehi gehi gacchiṣu // Lal_6.29 //
S04bsu022_u:1339: vātato va pittato va śleṣmasaṃnipātakaiḥ ye ca cakṣuroga śrotraroga kāyacittapīḍitā /
S04bsu022_u:1340: naikarūpa naikajāti vyādhibhiśca ye hatā sthāpite sma māya mūrdhni pāṇi bhonti nirjarā // Lal_6.30 //
S04bsu022_u:1341: athāpi vā tṛṇasya tūli bhūmito gṛhītvanā dadāti māya āturāṇa sarvi bhonti nirjarā /
S04bsu022_u:1342: saukhyaprāpti nirvikāra gehi gehi gacchiṣu bhaiṣajyabhūti vaidyarāji kukṣisaṃpratiṣṭhite // Lal_6.31 //
S04bsu022_u:1343: yasmi kāli māyadevi svātanuṃ nirīkṣate adṛśāti bodhisattva kukṣiye pratiṣṭhitam /
S04bsu022_u:1344: yathaiva candra antarīkṣa tārakai parīvṛtaṃ tathaiva nāthu bodhisattvalakṣaṇairalaṃkṛtam // Lal_6.32 //
S04bsu022_u:1345: no ca tasya rāga doṣa naiva moha bādhate kāmachandu naiva tasya īrṣi naiva hiṃsitā /
S04bsu022_u:1346: tuṣṭacitta hṛṣṭacitta prīti saumanasthitā kṣudhāpipāsa śīta uṣṇa naiva tasya bādhate // Lal_6.33 //
S04bsu022_u:1347: aghaṭṭitāśca nityakāla divyatūrya vādiṣu pravarṣayanti divyapuṣpa gandhaśreṣṭha śobhanā /
S04bsu022_u:1348: deva paśyi mānuṣāśca mānuṣā amānuṣāṃ no viheṭhi no vihiṃsi tatra te parasyaram // Lal_6.34 //
S04bsu022_u:1350: ramanti sattva krīḍayanti annapānudenti ca ānandaśabda ghoṣayanti hṛṣṭatuṣṭamānasāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:1351: kṣamā rajoanākulā ca kāli deva varṣate tṛṇāśca puṣpa oṣadhīya tasmi kāli rohiṣu // Lal_6.35 //
S04bsu022_u:1352: rājagehi saptarātra ratnavarṣa varṣito yato daridrasattva gṛhya dāna denti bhuñjate /
S04bsu022_u:1353: nāsti sattva yo daridra yo ca āsi duḥkhito bherumūrdhni nandaneva eva sattva nandiṣu // Lal_6.36 //
S04bsu022_u:1354: so ca rāju śākiyāna poṣadhī upoṣito rājyakāryu no karoti dharmameva gocarī /
S04bsu022_u:1355: tapovanaṃ ca so praviṣṭa māyādevī pṛcchate kīdṛśenti kāyi saukhya agrasattva dhārati // Lal_6.37 //
S04bsu022_u:1361: iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāseṣu nigateṣu bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye pratyupasthite rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhodyāne dvātriṃśatpūrvanimittāni prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:1364: puṣkariṇīṣu cotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇyabhyudgatāni kuḍmalībhūtāni na puṣpanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1365: tadā ca puṣpaphalavṛkṣā dharaṇītalādabhyudgamya kṣārakajātā na phalanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1367: viṃśati ca ratnanidhānaśatasahasrāṇyutplatya vyavasthitāni dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1370: himavatparvatapārśvācca siṃhapotakā āgatyāgatyābhinadantaḥ kapilāhvayapuravaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya dvāramūleṣvavatiṣṭhante sma,
S04bsu022_u:1372: pañcaśatāni pāṇḍarāṇāṃ hastiśāvakānāmāgatya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāgrakaraiścaraṇāvabhilikhanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1373: mekhalībaddhakāśca devadārakā rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāntaḥpure utsaṅgenotsaṅgamanuparivartamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1374: gaganatalagatārdhakāyā nāgakanyā nānāpūjopakaraṇaparigṛhītā adhyālambamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1375: daśa ca nāgakanyāsahasrāṇi mayūrāṅgahastakaparigṛhītā gagatatale 'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1376: daśa ca pūrṇakumbhasahasrāṇi kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvanti saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1377: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi gandhodakabhṛṅgāraparigṛhītā mūrdhni dhārayantyo 'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1378: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi chatradhvajapatākāparigṛhītā avasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1379: bahūni cāpsaraḥśatasahasrāṇi śaṅkhabherīmṛdaṅgapaṇavaiḥ ghaṇṭāvasaktaiḥ pratīkṣamāṇānyavasthitāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1381: sarvanadī ca prasravaṇāni ca na vahanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1384: ratnajālaparisphuṭaṃ ca rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhaṃ saṃsthitamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1386: kūṭāgāraprāsādatoraṇadvārakataleṣu ca maṇiratnānyabhipralambamānāni ca saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1391: utkūlanikūlāśca pṛthivīpradeśāḥ samāḥ samavasthitāḥ sarvavīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakarathyāntarāpaṇamukhāni ca pāṇitalamṛṣṭānīva puṣpābhikīrṇāni virocante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1393: sarvaśālavanadevatāśca patreṣvardhakāyānabhinirmāya namyamānāḥ sthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1396: atha khalu māyādevī bodhisattvasya janmakālasamayaṃ jñātvā bodhisattvasyaiva tejonubhāvena rātryāṃ prathame yāme rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramya gāthābhirabhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:1397: deva śṛṇu hi mahyaṃ bhāṣato yaṃ mataṃ me aciraciracireṇā jāta udyānabuddhiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1398: yadi ca tava na roṣo naiva doṣo na mohaḥ kṣipramahu vrajeyā krīḍaudyānabhūmim // Lal_7.1 //
S04bsu022_u:1399: tvamiha tapasi khinno dharmacittaprayukto ahu ca cirapraviṣṭā śuddhasattvaṃ dharentī /
S04bsu022_u:1400: drumavara pratibuddhāḥ phullitā śālavṛkṣāḥ yukta bhaviya devā gantumudyānabhūmim // Lal_7.2 //
S04bsu022_u:1401: ṛtupravara vasanto yoṣitāṃ maṇḍanīyo bhramaravaravighuṣṭāḥ kokilabarhigītāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1402: śuciruciravicitrā bhrāmyate puṣpareṇuḥ sādhu dadahi ājñāṃ gacchamo mā vilambaḥ // Lal_7.3 //
S04bsu022_u:1407: nīlagirinikāśāṃ meghavarṇānubaddhāṃ viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ gajānām /
S04bsu022_u:1408: maṇikanakavicitrāṃ hemajālopagūḍhāṃ ghaṇṭarucirapārśvān ṣaḍviṣāṇāṃ gajendrān // Lal_7.5 //
S04bsu022_u:1409: himarajatanikāśāṃ muñjakeśāṃ sukeśāṃ viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ hayānām /
S04bsu022_u:1410: kanakaracitapārśvā kiṅkiṇījālalambā pavanajavitavegā vāhanā pārthivasya // Lal_7.6 //
S04bsu022_u:1412: viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ suśīghraṃ māya saparivārāṃ rakṣathā apramattā // Lal_7.7 //
S04bsu022_u:1414: maṇikanakaniṣiktāṃ lumbinīṃ kārayadhvaṃ vividhavasanaratnaiḥ sarvavṛkṣāṃ pravethā /
S04bsu022_u:1415: vividhakusumacitraṃ nandanaṃ vā surāṇāṃ vadatha ca mama śīghraṃ sarvametaṃ vidhāya // Lal_7.8 //
S04bsu022_u:1416: vacanamimu niśamyā pāriṣadyaiḥ kṣaṇena vāhana kṛta sajjā lumbinī maṇḍitā sā /
S04bsu022_u:1418: jaya jaya hi narendrā āyu pālehi dīrghaṃ sarva kṛtu yathoktaṃ kāru deva pratīkṣa // Lal_7.9 //
S04bsu022_u:1419: so ca naravarendro hṛṣṭacitto bhavitvā gṛhavaramanuviṣṭo iṣṭikānevamāha /
S04bsu022_u:1420: yasya ahu manāpo yā ca me prītikāmā sā mi kuruta ājñāṃ maṇḍayitvātmabhāvam // Lal_7.10 //
S04bsu022_u:1421: varasurabhisugandhāṃ bhāvaraṅgāṃ vicitrāṃ vasana mṛdumanojñāṃ prāvṛṇothā udagrāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1422: urasi vigalitānāṃ muktahārā bhavethā ābharaṇavibhūṣāṃ darśayethādya sarvāḥ // Lal_7.11 //
S04bsu022_u:1424: bhūya kuruta harṣaṃ devakanyāna yūyaṃ śrutva madhuraghoṣaṃ devatāpi spṛheyuḥ // Lal_7.12 //
S04bsu022_u:1425: ekarathavaresmiṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ māyadevī mā ca puruṣa istrī anya tatrāruheyā /

S04bsu022_u:2478: devā sahasra bahavaḥ sthita añjalībhiḥ vandanti tasya caraṇau kṛtaniścayasya // Lal_11.24 //
S04bsu022_u:2479: śuddhodanaśca svagṛhe parimārgamāṇaḥ saṃpṛcchate kva nu gataḥ sa hi me kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2480: mātṛsvasā avaci mārgata no labhāmi saṃpṛcchatā narapate kva gataḥ kumāraḥ // Lal_11.25 //
S04bsu022_u:2481: śuddhodanastvaritu pṛcchati kāñcukīyaṃ dauvārikaṃ tathapi cāntajanaṃ samantāt /
S04bsu022_u:2482: dṛṣṭaṃ kumāra mama kenaci niṣkramanto śṛṇute varūpagatu deva kṛṣāṇagrāmam // Lal_11.26 //
S04bsu022_u:2483: so śīghrameva tvaritaṃ saha śākiyebhiḥ niṣkrāntu prekṣi kṛṣigrāmagiriṃ praviṣṭam /
S04bsu022_u:2484: yatha sūryakoṭiniyutāni samudgatāni tatha prekṣate hitakaraṃ śiriyā jvalantam // Lal_11.27 //
S04bsu022_u:2485: mukuṭaṃ ca khaṅga tatha pāduka chorayitvā kṛtvā daśāṅguli śire abhivandite tam /
S04bsu022_u:2486: sādhū subhūtavacanā ṛṣayo mahātmā vyaktaṃ kumāra abhiniṣkrami bodhihetoḥ // Lal_11.28 //
S04bsu022_u:2487: paripūrṇa dvādaśaśatā suprasannadevāḥ paccāśatā upagatā yatha śākiyānām /
S04bsu022_u:2488: dṛṣṭvā ca ṛddhi sugate guṇasāgarasya saṃbodhicittu janayaṃ dṛḍhaāśayena // Lal_11.29 //
S04bsu022_u:2490: so kampayitva trisahasra aśeṣabhūmiṃ smṛtu saṃprajānu pratibuddha tataḥ samādheḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2491: brahmasvaraḥ pitaramālapate dyutīmān utsṛjya tāta kṛṣigrāmabhato gaveṣa // Lal_11.30 //
S04bsu022_u:2492: yadi svarṇakāryu ahu svarṇa pravarṣayiṣye yadi vastrakāryu ahameva pradāsyi vastrāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:2493: atha dhānyakāryu ahameva pravarṣayiṣye samyakprayukta bhava sarvajage narendra // Lal_11.31 //
S04bsu022_u:2494: anuśāsayitva pitaraṃ janapāriṣadyāṃ tasmin kṣaṇe puravaraṃ puna so pravekṣī /
S04bsu022_u:2495: anuvartamāna jagataḥ sthihate puresmiṃ naiṣmkramyayuktamanasaḥ suviśuddhasattvaḥ // Lal_11.32 //
S04bsu022_u:2502: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saṃvṛddhe kumāre rājā śuddhodano 'pareṇa samayena śākyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saṃsthāgāre niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:2503: tatra te mahallakamahallakāḥ śākyā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāhuḥ - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt /
S04bsu022_u:2504: ayaṃ sarvārthasiddhakumāro naimittikairbrāhmaṇaiḥ kṛtaniścayaiśca devairyadbhūyasaivaṃ nirdiṣṭo yadi kumāro 'bhiniṣkramiṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:2506: uta nābhiniṣkramiṣyati rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturaṅgo vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2508: tadyathā - cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
S04bsu022_u:2510: saṃpūrṇaṃ cāsya putrasahasraṃ bhaviṣyati śūrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
S04bsu022_u:2517: tato rājā śuddhodana evamāha - yadyevaṃ tena hi vyavalokayata kamatā kanyā kumārasyānurūpā syāt /
S04bsu022_u:2519: ekaika evamāha - mama duhitā anurūpā syāt kumārasya /
S04bsu022_u:2524: tataśca te sarve saṃnipatya kumārasyaināṃ prakṛtimārocayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2525: tān kumāra uvāca - saptame divase prativacanaṃ śroṣyatheti //
S04bsu022_u:2529: kāmaguṇi na me 'sti chandarāgo na ca ahu śobhami istrigāramadhye /
S04bsu022_u:2530: yannu ahu vane vaseya tūṣṇīṃ dhyānasamādhisukhena śāntacittaḥ // Lal_12.2 //
S04bsu022_u:2533: sa punarapi mīmāṃsopāyakauśalyamāmukhīkṛtya sattvaparipākamavekṣamāṇo mahākarūṇāṃ saṃjanayya tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:2534: saṃkīrṇi paṅki padumāni vivṛddhimanti ākīrṇa rāja naramadhyi labhāti pūjām /
S04bsu022_u:2535: yada bodhisattva parivārabalaṃ labhante tada sattvakoṭinayutānyamṛte vinenti // Lal_12.3 //
S04bsu022_u:2536: ye cāpi pūrvaka abhūdvidu bodhisattvāḥ sarvebhi bhārya suta darśita istrigārāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2537: na ca rāgarakta na ca dhyānasukhebhi bhraṣṭāḥ hantānuśikṣayi ahaṃ pi guṇeṣu teṣām // Lal_12.4 //
S04bsu022_u:2538: na ca prākṛtā mama vadhū anukūla yā syād yasyā na iṣyatu guṇā sada satyavākyam /
S04bsu022_u:2539: yā cinti mahyamabhirādhayate 'pramattā rūpeṇa janmakulagotratayā suśuddhā // Lal_12.5 //
S04bsu022_u:2540: so gāthalekha likhite guṇaarthayuktā yā kanya īdṛśa bhave mama tāṃ varethā /
S04bsu022_u:2541: na mamārthu prākṛtajanena asaṃvṛtena yasyā guṇā kathayamī mama tāṃ varethā // Lal_12.6 //
S04bsu022_u:2542: yā rūpayauvanavarā na ca rūpamattā mātā svasā va yatha vartati maitracittā /
S04bsu022_u:2543: tyāge ratā śramaṇabrāhmaṇadānaśīlā tāṃ tādṛśāṃ mama vadhūṃ varayasva tāta // Lal_12.7 //
S04bsu022_u:2544: yasyā na mānu na khilo na ca doṣamasti na ca śāṭhya īrṣya na ca māya na ujjubhraṣṭā /
S04bsu022_u:2545: svapnāntare 'pi purūṣe na pare 'bhiraktā tuṣṭā svakena patinā śayate 'pramattā // Lal_12.8 //
S04bsu022_u:2546: na ca garvitā na pi ca uddhata na pragalbhā nirmāna mānavigatāpi ca ceṭibhūtā /
S04bsu022_u:2548: na ca pānagṛddha na raseṣu na śabdagandhe nirlobhabhidhyavigatā svadhanena tuṣṭā // Lal_12.9 //
S04bsu022_u:2549: satye sthitā na pi ca cañcala naiva bhrāntā na ca uddhatonnatasthitā hirivastrachannā /
S04bsu022_u:2550: na ca dṛṣṭimaṅgalaratā sada dharmayuktā kāyena vāca manasā sada śuddhabhāvā // Lal_12.10 //
S04bsu022_u:2551: na ca styānamiddhabahulā na ca mānamūḍhā mīmāṃsayukta sukṛtā sada dharmacārī /
S04bsu022_u:2552: śvaśrau ca tasya śvaśure yatha śāstṛpremā dāsī kalatra jani yādṛśamātmaprema // Lal_12.11 //
S04bsu022_u:2553: śāstre vidhijña kuśalā gaṇikā yathaiva paścāt svapet prathamamutthihate ca śayyāta /
S04bsu022_u:2554: maitrānuvarti akuhāpi ca mātṛbhūtā etādṛśīṃ mi nṛpate vadhukāṃ vṛṇīṣva // Lal_12.12 //
S04bsu022_u:2556: atha khalu bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodana imā gāthā vācayitvā purohitamāmantrayate sma - gaccha tvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa kapilavastumahānagare /
S04bsu022_u:2558: yasyā ete guṇāḥ saṃvidyante kṣatriyakanyāyā vā brāhmaṇakanyāyā vā vaiśyakanyāyā vā śūdrakanyāyā vā tāṃ kanyāmasmākaṃ prativedaya /
S04bsu022_u:2560: na hi kumāraḥ kulārthiko na gotrārthikaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2563: brāhmaṇīṃ kṣatriyāṃ kanyāṃ veśyāṃ śūdrīṃ tathaiva ca /
S04bsu022_u:2564: yasyā ete guṇāḥ santi tāṃ me kanyāṃ pravedaya // Lal_12.13 //
S04bsu022_u:2565: na kulena na gotreṇa kumāro mama vismitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2566: guṇe satye ca dharme ca tatrāsya ramate manaḥ // Lal_12.14 //
S04bsu022_u:2568: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa purohitastaṃ gāthālekhaṃ gṛhītvā kapilavastuni mahānagare gṛhādgṛhaṃ vyavalokayan gatvā hiṇḍan kanyāṃ paryeṣate sma /
S04bsu022_u:2570: so 'nupūrveṇa vicaran yena daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:2571_0: sa taṃ niveśanaṃ praviṣṭo 'drākṣīt kanyāmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśanīyāṃ paramayā
S04bsu022_u:2571_1: śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgatāṃ nātidīrghāṃ nātihrasvāṃ nātisthūlāṃ nātikṛśāṃ
S04bsu022_u:2573: atha sā dārikā purohitasya caraṇau gṛhītvā evamāha - kena te mahābrāhmaṇa kāryam?
S04bsu022_u:2576: teneti gātha likhitā guṇaye vadhūnāṃ yasyā guṇāsti hi ime sa hi tasya patnī // Lal_12.15 //
S04bsu022_u:2578: atha sā dārikā taṃ gāthālekhaṃ vācayitvā smitamupadarśya taṃ purohitaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣat -
S04bsu022_u:2579: mahyeti brāhmaṇa guṇā anurūpa sarve so me patirbhavatu saumya surūparūpaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2580: bhaṇahi kumāru yadi kārya ma hū vilamba mā hīnaprākṛtajanena bhaveya vāsaḥ // Lal_12.16 //
S04bsu022_u:2582: atha sa khalu purohito rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiva tamarthamārocayati sma - dṛṣṭā mayā deva kanyā yā kumārasyānurūpā syāt /
S04bsu022_u:2585: atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhavat - durāsadaḥ kumāraḥ śubhādhimuktaśca /
S04bsu022_u:2591: atha khalu rājā śuddhodano 'śokabhāṇḍāni kārayati sma suvarṇamayāni rūpyamayāni nānāratnamayāni /
S04bsu022_u:2592: kārayitvā ca kapilavastuni mahānagare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayāmāsa - saptame divase kumāro darśanaṃ dāsyati,
S04bsu022_u:2595: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase bodhisattvaḥ saṃsthāgāramupasaṃkramya bhadrāsane nyaṣīdat /
S04bsu022_u:2596: rājāpi śuddhodano 'dṛśyapuruṣān sthāpayati sma - yasyāṃ dārikāyāṃ kumārasya cakṣuḥ saṃniviśet,
S04bsu022_u:2598: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvantyaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagare dārikāstāḥ sarvā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya darśanāya aśokabhāṇḍakāni ca pratigṛhītum //
S04bsu022_u:2600: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathāgatābhyastābhyo dārikābhyo 'śokabhāṇḍakānyanuprayacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2601: tāśca dārikā na śaknuvanti sma bodhisattvasya śriyaṃ tejaśca soḍhum /
S04bsu022_u:2602: tā aśokabhāṇḍakāni gṛhītvā śīghraṃ śīghrameva prakrāmanti sma //
S04bsu022_u:2603: atha daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
S04bsu022_u:2604: sā dāsīgaṇaparivṛtā puraskṛtā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:2607: tadā sā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya prahasitavadanā bodhisattvamevamāha - kumāra kiṃ te mayāpanītaṃ yastvaṃ māṃ vimānayasi?
S04bsu022_u:2613: sā āha - na vayaṃ kumāraṃ vyalaṃkariṣyāmaḥ?
S04bsu022_u:2616: tatastairguhyapuruṣai rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiṣa vṛttānto nivedito 'bhūt - deva daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
S04bsu022_u:2619: ityetatkhalu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā śuddhodano daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya purohitaṃ dautyena preṣayati sma - yā te duhitā,
S04bsu022_u:2622: asmākaṃ cāyaṃ kuladharmaḥ śilpajñasya kanyā dātavyā nāśilpajñasyeti /
S04bsu022_u:2626: tato rājña etadabhavat - dvirapīdamahaṃ sahadharmeṇa coditaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2627: yadāpi mayoktaṃ kasmācchākyakumārāḥ kumārasyopasthānāya nāgacchantīti tadāpyahamabhihitaḥ - kiṃ vayaṃ maṇḍakasyopasthānaṃ kariṣyāma iti /
S04bsu022_u:2632: rājā āha - alaṃ te kumāra anena /
S04bsu022_u:2634: yāvattrirapi bodhisattvo rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ paripṛcchati sma //
S04bsu022_u:2636: tato rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvāya tāṃ prakṛtimārocayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2637: tāṃ śrutvā bodhisattva āha - deva asti punariha nagare kaścidyo mayā sārdhaṃ samarthaḥ śilpena śilapamupadarśayitum?
S04bsu022_u:2638: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ prahasitavadano bodhisattvamevamāha - śakyasi punastvaṃ putra śilpamupadarśayitum?
S04bsu022_u:2642: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagaravare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayati sma - saptame divase kumāraḥ svaṃ śilpamupadarśayati /
S04bsu022_u:2644: tatra saptame divase pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni saṃnipatitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:2645: daṇḍapāṇeśca śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā jayapatākā sthāpitābhūt - yo vā atra asidhanuṣkalāpayuddhasālambheṣu jeṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:2647: tatra sarvapurato devadattaḥ kumāro nagarādabhiniṣkrāmati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2648: śvetaśca hastī mahāpramāṇo bodhisattvasyārthe nagaraṃ praveśyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:2649: tatra devadattaḥ kumāra īrṣyayā ca śākyabalamadena ca mattaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2650: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ vāmena pāṇinā śuṇḍāyāṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā capeṭayā ekaprahāreṇaiva hato 'bhūt //
S04bsu022_u:2653: dṛṣṭvā ca paryapṛcchat - kenāyaṃ hata iti /
S04bsu022_u:2656: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ lāṅgūle gṛhītvā nagaradvārādapakarṣati sma //
S04bsu022_u:2659: dṛṣṭvā ca paryapṛcchat - kenāyaṃ hata iti /
S04bsu022_u:2667_0: tataḥ kumāro rathasya evaikaṃ pādaṃ bhūmau prasārya pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ hastināgaṃ
S04bsu022_u:2667_1: lāṅgūle gṛhitvā sapta prākārān sapta ca parikhānatikramya bahirnagarasya krośamātre prakṣipati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2668: yatra va pradeśe sa hastī patitastasmin pradeśe mahadbilaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ yatsāṃprataṃ hastigartetyabhidhīyate //
S04bsu022_u:2673: sapta purāparikhā atikramya kṣiptu bahiḥ svapurātu ayaṃ hi // Lal_12.17 //
S04bsu022_u:2676: saṃsārapurātu bahirdhā eka kṣapiṣyati prajñabalena // Lal_12.18 //
S04bsu022_u:2677: iti hi pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni nagarānniṣkamya yenānyatamaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo yatra śākyakumārāḥ śilpamupadarśayanti sma tenopasaṃkrāman /
S04bsu022_u:2678: rājāpi śuddhodano mahallakamahallakāśca śākyā mahāṃśca janakāyo yenāsau pṛthivīpradeśastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya cānyeṣāṃ ca śākyakumārāṇāṃ śilpaviśeṣaṃ draṣṭukāmāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2679: tatra ādita eva ye śākyakumārā lipyāṃ paṭuvidhijñāste bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ lipiṃ viśeṣayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2680: tatra taiḥ śākyairviśvāmitra ācāryaḥ sākṣī sthāpito 'bhūt - sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo 'tra kumāro lipijñāne viśiṣyate yadi vā lekhyato yadi vā bahulipiniryāṇataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2681: atha viśvāmitra ācāryaḥ pratyakṣo bodhisattvasya lipijñāne smitamupadarśayannime gāthe 'bhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:2683: yāvanti kecillipi sarvaloke tatraiṣa pāraṃgatu śuddhasattvaḥ // Lal_12.19 //
S04bsu022_u:2684: nāmāpi yūyaṃ ca ahaṃ ca teṣāṃ lipīna jānāma na cākṣarāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:2685: yānyeṣa jānāti manuṣyacandro ahamatra pratyakṣu vijeṣyate 'yam // Lal_12.20 //
S04bsu022_u:2688: tatrārjuno nāma śākyagaṇako mahāmātraḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanāsu pāraṃgataḥ,
S04bsu022_u:2689: sa sākṣī sthāpito 'bhūt - sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo 'tra kumāro viśiṣyate saṃkhyājñānata iti /
S04bsu022_u:2693: bodhisattvasyaika dvau trayaścatvāraḥ pañcadaśa viṃśattriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśacchataṃ yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapatkāle nikṣipanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:2699: dvāvapi trayo 'pi pañcāpi daśāpi viṃśatyapi triṃśadapi catvāriṃśadapi pañcāśadapi yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapaduddiśanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2700: na ca pariprāpayanti sma bodhisattvasya nikṣipataḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2712: īdṛśī ca iyaṃ prajñā buddhirjñānaṃ smṛtirmatiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2713: adyāpi śikṣate cāyaṃ gaṇitaṃ jñānasāgaraḥ // Lal_12.22 //
S04bsu022_u:2715: ekakaṇṭhāścemāṃ vācamabhāṣanta - jayati jayati bhoḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2716: sarve cāsanebhya utthāya kṛtāñjalipuṭā bhūtvā bodhisattvaṃ namaskṛtya rājānaṃ śuddhodanametadavocan - lābhāste mahārāja paramasulabdhāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:2717: yasya te putra evaṃ śīghralaghujavacapalaparipṛcchāpratibhāna iti //
S04bsu022_u:2718: atha sa rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvamevamāha - śakyasi putra arjunena gaṇakamahāmātreṇa sārdhaṃ saṃkhyājñānakauśalyagaṇanāgatimanupraveṣṭum?
S04bsu022_u:2720: athārjuno gaṇakamahāmātro bodhisattvamevamāha - jānīṣe tvaṃ kumāra koṭiśatottarāṃ nāma gaṇanāgatim?
S04bsu022_u:2747: iti hi tallakṣaṇagaṇanayā sumerūparvatarājo lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gacchet /
S04bsu022_u:2749: yasyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2756: yasyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ daśa gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /

S04bsu022_u:3519: eṣo hi deva puruṣo iti bhikṣunāmā apahāya kāmaratayaḥ suvinītacārī /

S04bsu022_u:3522: sādhū subhāṣitamidaṃ mama rocate ca pravrajya nāma vidubhiḥ satataṃ praśastā /

S04bsu022_u:3532: caturṣu nagaradvāraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu caturo mahāsenāvyūhān sthāpayati sma bodhisattvasya parirakṣaṇārtham /
S04bsu022_u:3533: ya enaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ rakṣanti sma - mā bodhisattvo 'bhiniṣkramiṣyatīti /
S04bsu022_u:3534: antaḥpure cājñāṃ dadāti sma - mā sma kadācitsaṃgītiṃ vicchetsyatha /
S04bsu022_u:3544: nirghoṣaśca balasya tasya mahataḥ śabdo mahā śrūyate /
S04bsu022_u:3545: nagaraṃ vyākulu bhītatrastamanaso mā smād vrajetsūrato
S04bsu022_u:3546: mā bhūcchākyakuloditasya gamane chidyeta vaṃśo hyayam // Lal_14.17 //
S04bsu022_u:3547: ājñapto yuvatījanaśca satataṃ saṃgīti mā chetsyathā
S04bsu022_u:3550: ye vā istriyamāya nekavividhā darśetha ceṣṭāṃ bahuṃ
S04bsu022_u:3551: ārakṣāṃ prakarotha vighna kuruthā mā khu vrajetsūrataḥ // Lal_14.18 //
S04bsu022_u:3552: tasyā niṣkramikāli sārathivare pūrve nimittā ime
S04bsu022_u:3553: haṃsā kroñca mayūra sārika śukā no te ravaṃ muñciṣu /
S04bsu022_u:3556: puḍinīpuṣkariṇīṣu padma rucirā mlānāni mlāyanti ca
S04bsu022_u:3557: vṛkṣāḥ śuṣkapalāśa puṣparahitāḥ puṣpanti bhūyo na ca /
S04bsu022_u:3559: bherīścaiva mṛdaṅga pāṇyabhihatā bhidyanti no vādyiṣu // Lal_14.20 //
S04bsu022_u:3560: sarvaṃ vyākulamāsi tacca nagaraṃ nidrābhibhūtaṃ bhṛśaṃ
S04bsu022_u:3561: no nṛtte na ca gāyite na ramite bhūyo manaḥ kasyacit /
S04bsu022_u:3563: hā dhikśākyakulasya ṛddhi vipulā mā haiva saṃdhakṣyate // Lal_14.21 //
S04bsu022_u:3564: ekasmiṃ śayane sthite sthitamabhūdgopā tathā pārthivo
S04bsu022_u:3567: vṛkṣā mārutaeritā kṣiti patī utpāṭya mūloddhṛtāḥ // Lal_14.22 //
S04bsu022_u:3569: keśānadṛśi lūna dakṣiṇi bhuje mukuṭaṃ ca vidhvaṃsitam /
S04bsu022_u:3570: hastau chinna tathaiva chinna caraṇau nagnā dṛśī ātmanaṃ
S04bsu022_u:3571: muktāhāra tathaiva mekhalamaṇī chinnā dṛśī ātmanaḥ // Lal_14.23 //
S04bsu022_u:3572: śayanasyā dṛśi chinna pāda caturo dharaṇītalesmiṃ chayī
S04bsu022_u:3573: chatre daṇḍu sucitru śrīma ruciraṃ chinnā dṛśī pārthive /
S04bsu022_u:3574: sarve ābharaṇā vikīrṇa patitā muhyanti te vāriṇā
S04bsu022_u:3580: meruṃ parvatarājamadṛśi tadā sthānātu saṃkampitam // Lal_14.25 //
S04bsu022_u:3582: dṛṣṭvā sā pratibuddha ruṇṇanayanā svaṃ svāminaṃ abravīt /
S04bsu022_u:3583: devā kiṃ mi bhaviṣyate khalu bhaṇā supināntarāṇīdṛśā
S04bsu022_u:3584: bhrāntā me smṛti no ca paśyami punaḥ śokārditaṃ me manaḥ // Lal_14.26 //
S04bsu022_u:3586: gopāmālapate bhava pramuditā pāpaṃ na te vidyate /
S04bsu022_u:3588: ime ko 'nyaḥ paśyati naikaduḥkhavihitaḥ svapnāntarāṇīdṛśā // Lal_14.27 //
S04bsu022_u:3589: yatte dṛṣṭā medinī kampamānā kūṭā śailā medinīye patantā /
S04bsu022_u:3590: devā nāgā rākṣasā bhūtasaṃghāḥ sarve tubhyaṃ pūjyaśreṣṭhāṃ karonti // Lal_14.28 //
S04bsu022_u:3591: yatte dṛṣṭā vṛkṣamūloddhṛtāni keśāṃ lūnāṃ dakṣiṇenādṛśāsi /
S04bsu022_u:3592: kṣipraṃ gope kleśajālaṃ chinitvā dṛṣṭījālaṃ uddharī saṃskṛtātaḥ // Lal_14.29 //
S04bsu022_u:3593: yatte dṛṣṭau candrasūryau patantau dṛṣṭā nakṣatrā jyotiṣā nīpatantaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3594: kṣipraṃ gope kleśaśatrū nihatvā pūjyā loke bhāvinī tvaṃ praśasyā // Lal_14.30 //
S04bsu022_u:3595: yatte dṛṣṭā muktahāraṃ viśīrṇaṃ nagnaṃ bhagnaṃ sarvakāyādṛśāsi /
S04bsu022_u:3596: kṣipraṃ gope istrikāyaṃ jahitvā puruṣastvaṃ vai bheṣyase nocireṇa // Lal_14.31 //
S04bsu022_u:3597: yatte dṛṣṭaṃ mañcakaṃ chinnapādaṃ chatre daṇḍaṃ ratnacitraṃ prabhagnam /
S04bsu022_u:3598: kṣipraṃ gope ogha catvāri tīrtvā māṃ draṣṭāsī ekachatraṃ triloke // Lal_14.32 //
S04bsu022_u:3600: yatte dṛṣṭā bhūṣaṇā uhyamānā cūḍā vastrā mahya mañce 'dṛśāsi /
S04bsu022_u:3601: kṣipraṃ gope lakṣaṇairbhūṣitāṅgaṃ māṃ saṃpaśyī sarvalokaiḥ stuvantam // Lal_14.33 //
S04bsu022_u:3602: yatte dṛṣṭā dīpakoṭīśatāni nagarānniṣkrāntā tatpuraṃ cāndhakāram /
S04bsu022_u:3603: kṣipraṃ gope mohavidyāndhakāre prajñāloke kurvamī sarvalokam // Lal_14.34 //
S04bsu022_u:3604: yatte dṛṣṭaṃ muktahāraṃ prabhagnaṃ chinnaṃ caiva svarṇasūtraṃ vicitram /
S04bsu022_u:3605: kṣipraṃ gope kleśajālaṃ chinitvā saṃjñā sūtraṃ uddharī saṃskṛtātaḥ // Lal_14.35 //
S04bsu022_u:3606: yatte gope cittikāraṃ karoṣī nityaṃ pūjāṃ gauraveṇottamena /
S04bsu022_u:3607: nāstī tubhyaṃ durgatī naiva śokaḥ kṣipraṃ bhohī prītiprāmodyalabdhā // Lal_14.36 //
S04bsu022_u:3608: pūrve mahyaṃ dānu dattaṃ praṇītaṃ śīlaṃ cīrṇaṃ bhāvitā nityakṣānti /
S04bsu022_u:3609: tasmānmahyaṃ ye prasādaṃ labhante sarve bhontī prītiprāmodyalābhāḥ // Lal_14.37 //
S04bsu022_u:3610: kalpā koṭī saṃskṛtā me anantā bodhīmārgo śodhito me praṇītaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3611: tasmānmahyaṃ ye prasādaṃ karonti sarve chinnā teṣu trīṇyapyapāyāḥ // Lal_14.38 //
S04bsu022_u:3612: harṣaṃ vindā mā ca khedaṃ janehi tuṣṭiṃ vindā saṃjanehī ca prītim /
S04bsu022_u:3613: kṣipraṃ bheṣye prītiprāmodyalābhī sehī gope bhadrakā te nimittā // Lal_14.39 //
S04bsu022_u:3614: so puṇyatejabharito siritejagarbho pūrve nimittasupine imi adṛśāsi /

S04bsu022_u:3617: so adṛśāsi ca karāccaraṇāddhatānā mahasāgarebhi catubhirjala lolayantā /
S04bsu022_u:3618: sarvāmimāṃ vasumatīṃ śayanaṃ vicitraṃ meruṃ ca parvatavaraṃ śirasopadhānam // Lal_14.41 //
S04bsu022_u:3619: ābhā pramukta supine tada adṛśāsi loke vilokitu mahātamasāndhakāram /
S04bsu022_u:3620: chatrodgataṃ dharaṇiye spharate trilokaṃ ābhāya spṛṣṭa vinipātadukhā praśāntā // Lal_14.42 //
S04bsu022_u:3621: kṛṣṇā śubhā caturi prāṇaka pāda lekhī catuvarṇa etva śakunādbhuta ekavarṇāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3622: mīḍhaṃgirī paramahīna jugupsanīyā abhibhūya caṃkramati tatra ca nopalipto // Lal_14.43 //
S04bsu022_u:3623: bhūyo 'dṛśī supini nadya jalaprapūrṇā bahusattvakoṭinayutāni ca uhyamānā /

S04bsu022_u:3627: siṃhāsane va hi niṣaṇṇa sumerupṛṣṭhe śiṣyāṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭānamarānnamantāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:3628: saṃgrāmamadhyi jayu adṛśi ātmanaśca ānandaśabdamamarāṃ gagane bruvantaḥ // Lal_14.46 //

S04bsu022_u:3637: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - ayuktametanmama syādakṛtajñatā ca yadahamaprativedya mahārājñaḥ śuddhodanasya ananujñātaśca pitrā niṣkrameyam /
S04bsu022_u:3638: sa rātrau praśāntāyāṃ svakādupasthānaprāsādādavatīrya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya prāsādatale pratiṣṭhito 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:3639: pratiṣṭhitamātrasya ca punarbodhisattvasya sarvo 'sau prāsāda ābhayā sphuṭo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:3641: dṛṣṭvā ca punastvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ kāñcukiyamāmantrayāmāsa - kiṃ bhoḥ kāñcukīya sūryo 'bhyudgato yeneyaṃ prabhā virājate?
S04bsu022_u:3642: kāñcukīya āha - adyāpi tāvadeva rajanyā upārdhaṃ nātikrāntam / api ca deva -
S04bsu022_u:3643: sūryaprabhāya bhavate drumakuḍyachāyā saṃtāpayāti ca tanuṃ prakaroti dharmam /
S04bsu022_u:3644: haṃsā mayūraśukakokilacakravākāḥ pratyūṣakālasamaye svarutāṃ ravanti // Lal_15.1 //
S04bsu022_u:3645: ābhā iyaṃ tu naradeva sukhā manojñā prahlādanī śubhakarī na karoti dāham /
S04bsu022_u:3646: kuḍyā ca vṛkṣa abhibhūya na cāsti chāyā niḥsaṃśayaṃ guṇadharo iha adya prāptaḥ // Lal_15.2 //
S04bsu022_u:3647: so prekṣate daśadiśo nṛpatī viṣaṇṇo dṛṣṭaśca so kamalalocana śuddhasattvaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3648: so 'bhyutthituṃ śayani icchati na prabhoti pitṛgauravaṃ janayate varaśuddhabuddhiḥ // Lal_15.3 //
S04bsu022_u:3649: so ca sthihitva purato nṛpatiṃ avocat mā bhūyu vighna prakarohi ma caiva khedam /
S04bsu022_u:3650: naiṣkramyakālasamayo mama deva yukto hanta kṣamasva nṛpate sajanaḥ sarāṣṭraḥ // Lal_15.4 //
S04bsu022_u:3651: taṃ aśrupūrṇanayano nṛpatī babhāṣe kiṃcitprayojanu bhavedvinivartane te /
S04bsu022_u:3652: kiṃ yācase mama varaṃ vada sarva dāsye anugṛhṇa rājakulu māṃ ca idaṃ ca rāṣṭram // Lal_15.5 //
S04bsu022_u:3654: tada bodhisattva avacī madhurapralāpī icchāmi deva caturo vara tān mi dehi /
S04bsu022_u:3655: yadi śakyase daditu mahya vase ti tatra tad drakṣyase sada gṛhe na ca niṣkramiṣye // Lal_15.6 //
S04bsu022_u:3656: icchāmi deva jara mahya na ākrameyyā
S04bsu022_u:3658: ārogyaprāptu bhavi no ca bhaveta vyādhiḥ
S04bsu022_u:3659: amitāyuṣaśca bhavi no ca bhaveta mṛtyuḥ (saṃpattitaśca vipulā nu bhavedvipattiḥ) // Lal_15.7 //
S04bsu022_u:3660: rājā śruṇitva vacanaṃ paramaṃ dukhārto asthānu yācasi kumāra na me 'tra śaktiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3661: jaravyādhimṛtyubhayataśca vipattitaśca kalpasthitīya ṛṣayo 'pi na jātu muktāḥ // Lal_15.8 //
S04bsu022_u:3662: yadidāni deva caturo vara no dadāsi jaravyādhimṛtyubhayataśca vipattitaśca /
S04bsu022_u:3663: hanta śṛṇuṣva nṛpate aparaṃ varaikaṃ asmāccyutasya pratisaṃdhi na me bhaveyā // Lal_15.9 //
S04bsu022_u:3664: śrutvaiva cema vacanaṃ narapuṃgavasya tṛṣṇā tanuṃ ca kari chindati putrasneham /
S04bsu022_u:3665: anumodamī hitakarā jagati pramokṣaṃ abhiprāyu tubhya paripūryatu yanmataṃ te // Lal_15.10 //
S04bsu022_u:3666: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pratikramya svake prāsāde 'bhiruhya śayane niṣasāda /
S04bsu022_u:3667: na cāsya kaścidgamanaṃ vā āgamanaṃ vā saṃjānīte sma //
S04bsu022_u:3668: iti hi bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodanastasyā rātryā atyayena sarvaṃ śākyagaṇaṃ saṃnipātyaināṃ prakṛtimārocayati sma - abhiniṣkramiṣyati kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3671: tatkasmāt? ayaṃ ca mahāñśākyagaṇaḥ, sa caikākī /
S04bsu022_u:3673_0: tatra taiḥ śākyai rājñā śuddhodanena ca pañca śākyakumāraśatāni kṛtāstrāṇi kṛtayogyāni
S04bsu022_u:3673_1: iṣvastraśikṣitāni mahānagnabalopetāni pūrve nagaradvāre sthāpitānyabhūvan bodhisattvasya rakṣaṇārtham /
S04bsu022_u:3677: evaṃ dakṣiṇe paścime uttare nagaradvāre pañca pañca śākyakumāraśatāni kṛtāstrāṇi kṛtayogyāni iṣvastraśikṣitāni mahānagnabalopetāni /
S04bsu022_u:3679: ekaikaṃ ca rathaṃ pañcapattiśataparivāraṃ sthāpitamabhūta bodhisattvasya rakṣārtham /
S04bsu022_u:3681: rājā ca śuddhodanaḥ pañcabhiḥ śākyakumāraśataiḥ sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ svake gṛhadvāre hayeṣu ca gajeṣu ca samabhiruhya jāgarti sma /
S04bsu022_u:3683: jvāletha dīpa vimalāṃ dhvajāgri maṇiratna sarvi sthāpethā /
S04bsu022_u:3684: olambayātha hārāṃ prabhāṃ kuruta sarvi gehesmin // Lal_15.11 //
S04bsu022_u:3685: saṃgīti yojayethā jāgaratha atandritā imāṃ rajanīm /
S04bsu022_u:3686: pratirakṣathā kumāraṃ yathā avidito na gaccheyā // Lal_15.12 //
S04bsu022_u:3689: dvārāṃ pithetha sarvāṃ suyantritāṃ nirgaḍāṃ dṛḍhakapāṭāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:3690: muñcatha mā ca akāle mā agrasattva itu na vrajeyā // Lal_15.14 //
S04bsu022_u:3694: tatha tatha parākramathā yathā vighātaṃ na vindeyā // Lal_15.16 //
