S04bsu022_u:3959_2: iti jñātvā chandakamāmantrayate sma - chandaka māṃ medānīṃ khedaya /
S04bsu022_u:3963_0: atha tatkṣaṇameva catvāro lokapālā bodhisattvasya vacanamupaśrutya svakasvakāni ca
S04bsu022_u:3963_1: bhavanāni gatvā bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe svaiḥ svairvyūhaistvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ punarapi
S04bsu022_u:3965: tatra dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo gandharvādhipatiḥ pūrvasyā diśa āgato 'bhūt sārdhamanekairgandharvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrairnānātūryasaṃgītisaṃpravāditena /
S04bsu022_u:3966: āgatya ca kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgataḥ pūrvāṃ diśamupaniśrityāsthāt bodhisattvaṃ namasyamānaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:3968: āgatya ca kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgata eva dakṣiṇāṃ diśamupaniśrityāsthāt bodhisattvaṃ namasyamānaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:3970: āgatya ca kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgata eva paścimāṃ diśamupaniśrityāsthāt bodhisattvaṃ namasyamānaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:3972: āgatya kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgata evottarāṃ diśamupaniśrityāsthāt bodhisattvaṃ namasyamānaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:3974: āgatya kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgata eva saparivāra uparyantarikṣe 'sthāt bodhisattvaṃ namaskurvan //
S04bsu022_u:3975: iti hi bhikṣavaśchandako bodhisattvasya vacanamupaśrutyāśrupūrṇanayano bodhisattvamevamāha - āryaputra tvaṃ ca kālajño velajñaśca samayajñaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3982: yattanmayā prārthitu dīrgharātraṃ sattvānamarthaṃ parimārgatā hi /
S04bsu022_u:3983: avāpya bodhiṃ ajarāmaraṃ padaṃ moce jagattasya kṣaṇo upasthitaḥ // Lal_15.60 //
S04bsu022_u:3987: bhaumāntarīkṣāśca tathaiva pālāḥ śakraśca devādhipatiḥ sayakṣaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3988: yāmāśca devāstuṣitāśca nirmitāḥ paranirmitodyukta tathaiva devāḥ // Lal_15.61 //
S04bsu022_u:3989: varuṇo manasvī api nāgarājā anāvataptaśca tathaiva māgaraḥ
S04bsu022_u:3990: abhiyukta te cāpyabhipūjanārthaṃ naiṣkramyakāle narapuṃgavasya // Lal_15.62 //
S04bsu022_u:3991: ye cāpi rūpāvacareṣu devāḥ praśāntacārī saha dhyānagocarāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3992: abhiyukta te cāpyabhipūjanārthaṃ trailokyapūjyasya narottamasya // Lal_15.63 //
S04bsu022_u:3994: drakṣyāmahe niṣkramaṇaṃ jinasya pūjāṃ kariṣyāmi tathānurūpām // Lal_15.64 //
S04bsu022_u:3995: sa cāpi guhyādhipatirmahātmā pradīptavajro nabhasi pratisthitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3996: saṃnaddhagātro balavīryavikramaḥ kareṇa guhya jvalamānu vajram // Lal_15.65 //
S04bsu022_u:3997: candraśca sūryo ubhi devaputrau pradakṣiṇaṃ vāmaku supratisthitau /
S04bsu022_u:3999: puṣyaśca nakṣatra sapāriṣadyo audārikaṃ nirmiṇi ātmabhāvam /
S04bsu022_u:4001: sarve 'dya siddhāḥ śubha tubhya maṅgalāḥ puṣyaśca yuktaḥ samayaśca gantum /
S04bsu022_u:4008: sa cāpi paryaṅkavare niṣaṇṇo devairvṛto bhrājati dīptatejaḥ // Lal_15.70 //
S04bsu022_u:4009: nagare istrika dārakāśca puruṣā yāścābhavan dārikāḥ
S04bsu022_u:4012: sarve te śayitā kilāntamanasaḥ paśyanti rūpaṃ na te // Lal_15.71 //
S04bsu022_u:4013: ye cā te dṛḍhavajratomaradharā śākyaiḥ sutāḥ sthāpitāḥ
S04bsu022_u:4015: rājā rājakumāra pārthivajanaḥ sarve prasuptā bhavan
S04bsu022_u:4016: api cā nārigaṇā vinagnavasanā suptā na te buddhiṣū // Lal_15.72 //
S04bsu022_u:4018: rātrau nirgata ardharātrasamaye taṃ chandakaṃ abravīt /
S04bsu022_u:4019: sādhū chandaka dehi kaṇṭhaku mama svālaṃkṛtaṃ śobhanaṃ
S04bsu022_u:4020: mā vighnaṃ kuru me dadāhi capalaṃ yadi me priyaṃ manyase // Lal_15.73 //
S04bsu022_u:4021: kva tvaṃ yāsyasi sattvasārathivarā kiṃ aśvakāryaṃ ca te
S04bsu022_u:4022: kālajñaḥ samayajña dharmacaraṇo kālo na gantu kvacit /
S04bsu022_u:4023: dvārāste pithitā dṛḍhārgalakṛtā ko dāsyate tāṃ tava /
S04bsu022_u:4024: śakreṇā manasātha cetanavaśātte dvāra muktā kṛtāḥ
S04bsu022_u:4025: dṛṣṭvā chandaka harṣito puna dukhī aśrūṇi so 'vartayī /
S04bsu022_u:4026: hā dhikko mi sahāyu kiṃ tu kurumī dhāvāmi kāṃ vā diśaṃ
S04bsu022_u:4027: ugraṃtejadhareṇa vākyu bhaṇitaṃ śakyaṃ na saṃdhāritum // Lal_15.74 //
S04bsu022_u:4029: sā senā caturaṅginī balavatī kiṃ bhū karotīha hā
S04bsu022_u:4030: rājā rājakumāra pārthiva jano nemaṃ hi budhyanti te /
S04bsu022_u:4032: hā dhiggacchati sidhyate 'sya praṇidhiryaścintitaḥ pūrvaśaḥ // Lal_15.75 //
S04bsu022_u:4034: sādhu chandaka dehi kaṇṭhakavaraṃ mā khedayī nāyakam /
S04bsu022_u:4036: naivedaṃ pratibudhyate puravaraṃ osvāpitaṃ devataiḥ // Lal_15.76 //
S04bsu022_u:4037: paśya chandaka antarīkṣa vimalaṃ divyā prabhā śobhate
S04bsu022_u:4039: śakraṃ paśya śacīpatiṃ balavṛtaṃ dvārasthitaṃ bhrājate
S04bsu022_u:4041: śrutvā chandaka devatāna vacanaṃ taṃ kaṇṭhakaṃ ālapī
S04bsu022_u:4043: so taṃ varṣikuvarṇa kāñcanakhuraṃ svālaṃkṛtaṃ kṛtvanā
S04bsu022_u:4044: upanetī guṇasāgarasya vahanaṃ rodantako durmanā // Lal_15.78 //
S04bsu022_u:4045: eṣā te varalakṣaṇā hitakarā aśvaḥ sujātaḥ śubho
S04bsu022_u:4046: gaccha sidhyatu tubhya eva praṇidhiryaścintitaḥ pūrvaśaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4047: ye te vighnakarā vrajantu praśamaṃ āsāṃ vrataṃ sidhyatāṃ
S04bsu022_u:4048: bhavahī sarvajagasya saukhyadadanaḥ svargasya śāntyāstathā // Lal_15.79 //
S04bsu022_u:4049: sarvā kampita ṣaḍvikāra dharaṇī śayanādyadā sotthitaḥ
S04bsu022_u:4052: śakro brahma ubhau ca tasya purato darśyanti mārgo hyayam // Lal_15.80 //
S04bsu022_u:4053: ābhā tena pramukta acchavimalā obhāsitā medinī
S04bsu022_u:4054: sarve śānta apāya sattva sukhitā kleśairna bādhyī tadā /
S04bsu022_u:4056: sarve kṛtva pradakṣiṇaṃ puravaraṃ gacchanti harṣānvitāḥ // Lal_15.81 //
S04bsu022_u:4058: puravarottami devata dīnamanā upagamya gacchati mahāpuruṣe /
S04bsu022_u:4059: purataḥ sthitā karuṇadīnamanā girayā samālapati padmamukham // Lal_15.82 //
S04bsu022_u:4060: tamasākulaṃ bhuvimu sarvapuraṃ nagaraṃ na śobhati tvaya rahitam /
S04bsu022_u:4061: na mamātra kāci rati prītikarī tyaktaṃ tvayā ca yadidaṃ bhavanam // Lal_15.83 //
S04bsu022_u:4062: na punaḥ śruṇiṣyi rutu pakṣigaṇe antaḥpure madhuraveṇuravam /
S04bsu022_u:4063: maṅgalyaśabda tatha gītaravaṃ pratibodhanaṃ tava anantayaśaḥ // Lal_15.84 //
S04bsu022_u:4064: darśe na bhūyu surasiddhagaṇāṃ kurvantu pūja tava rātridivam /
S04bsu022_u:4065: ghrāyiṣyi gandha na ca divya punaḥ tvayi nirgate nihatakleśagaṇe // Lal_15.85 //
S04bsu022_u:4066: nirbhuktamālyamiva paryuṣitaṃ tyaktaṃ tvayādya bhavanaṃ hi tathā /
S04bsu022_u:4067: naṭaraṅgakalpa pratibhāyati me tvayi nirgate na bhuyu tejaśiri // Lal_15.86 //
S04bsu022_u:4068: ojo balaṃ harasi sarvapure na ca śobhate aṭavitulyamidam /
S04bsu022_u:4069: vitathaṃ ṛṣīṇa vacanādya bhutaṃ yehī viyākṛtu bhuvi cakrabalo // Lal_15.87 //
S04bsu022_u:4070: abalaṃ balaṃ bhuvimu śākyabalaṃ ucchinna vaṃśa iha rājakule /
S04bsu022_u:4071: āśā pranaṣṭa iha śākyagaṇe tvayi nirgate mahati puṇyadrume // Lal_15.88 //
S04bsu022_u:4072: ahameva tubhya gati gacchayamī yatha tvaṃ prayāsi amalā vimalā /
S04bsu022_u:4074: api cā kṛpā karuṇa saṃjaniya vyavalokayasva bhavanaṃ tvamidam // Lal_15.89 //
S04bsu022_u:4075: vyavalokya caiva bhavanaṃ matimān madhurasvaro giramudīritavān /
S04bsu022_u:4076: nāhaṃ pravekṣi kapilasya puraṃ aprāpya jātimaraṇāntakaram // Lal_15.90 //
S04bsu022_u:4078: yāvanna labdha varabodhi mayā ajarāmaraṃ padavaraṃ hyamṛtam // Lal_15.91 //
S04bsu022_u:4079: yadasau jagatpradhāno niṣkrāntu bodhisattvo tasyā nabhe vrajanto stavayiṃsu apsarāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:4080: eṣa maha dakṣiṇīyo eṣa maha puṇyakṣetraṃ puṇyarthikāna kṣetraṃ amṛtāphalasya dātā // Lal_15.92 //
S04bsu022_u:4081: ena bahukalpakoṭī dānadamasaṃyamenā samudānitāsya bodhiḥ sattvakaruṇāyamānā /
S04bsu022_u:4082: eṣa pariśuddhaśīlo suvrata akhaṇḍacārī na ca kāma naiva bhogāṃ prārthentu śīlarakṣī // Lal_15.93 //
S04bsu022_u:4083: eṣa sada kṣāntivādī chidyanti aṅgamaṅge na ca krodhu naiva roṣaḥ sattvaparitrāyaṇārtham /
S04bsu022_u:4084: eṣa sada vīryavanto avikhinna kalpakoṭyaḥ samudānitāsya bodhiryaṣṭā ca yakṣakoṭīḥ // Lal_15.94 //
S04bsu022_u:4085: eṣa sada dhyānadhyāyī śāntapraśāntacitto dhyāyitva sarvakleśāṃ moceṣyi sattvakoṭīḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4086: eṣo asaṅga prājñaḥ kalpairvikalpamukto kalpairvimuktacitto jinu bheṣyate svayaṃbhūḥ // Lal_15.95 //
S04bsu022_u:4087: eṣa sada maitracitto karuṇāya pāraprāpto mudito upekṣadhyāyī brāhme pathi vidhijñaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4088: eṣo 'tidevadevo devebhi pūjanīyo śubhavimalaśuddhacitto guṇaniyutapāraprāptaḥ // Lal_15.96 //
S04bsu022_u:4090: śaraṇaṃ bhayārditānāṃ dīpo acakṣuṣāṇāṃ layano upadrutānāṃ vaidyaścirāturāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:4091: rājeva dharmarājo indraḥ sahasranetro brahmasvayaṃbhubhūtaḥ kāyapraśabdhacitto // Lal_15.97 //
S04bsu022_u:4092: dhīraḥ prabhūtaprajño vīro viviktacittaḥ śūraḥ kileśaghātī ajitaṃjayo jitāriḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4093: siṃho bhayaprahīṇo nāgaḥ sudāntacitto ṛṣabho gaṇapradhānaḥ kṣāntaḥ prahīṇakopaḥ // Lal_15.98 //
S04bsu022_u:4099: ena jitu kleśamāro ena jitu skandhamāro ena jitu mṛtyumāro nihato 'sya deva(putra)māro /
S04bsu022_u:4100: eṣa maha sārthavāho kupathapratisthitānāṃ aṣṭāṅgamārgaśreṣṭhaṃ deśeṣyate nacireṇā // Lal_15.100 //
S04bsu022_u:4102: bhuvi divi ca saṃpraghuṣṭo jinu bheṣyate svayaṃbhūḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4104: yatpuṇya tvāṃ stavitvā bhoma yatha vādisiṃhaḥ // Lal_15.101 //
S04bsu022_u:4105: iti hi bhikṣavo 'bhiniṣkrānto bodhisattvo 'tikramya śākyānatikramya kroḍyānatikramya mallān maineyānāmanuvaineye niga me ṣaṭsu yojaneṣu /
S04bsu022_u:4107: tato bodhisattvo kaṇṭhakādavatīrya dharaṇītale sthitvā taṃ mahāntaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragasaṃghaṃ visarjayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4108: visarjya cāsyaitadabhūt -imānyābharaṇāni kaṇṭhakaṃ ca chandakasya haste visarjayāmīti //
S04bsu022_u:4111: yatra ca pradeśe chandako nivṛttastatra caityaṃ sthāpitamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4114: punaśca bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - kathaṃ ca nāma cūḍā ca pravrajyā ceti /
S04bsu022_u:4115: sa khaḍgena cūḍāṃ chittvā antarikṣe kṣipati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4116: sā ca trāyatriṃśatā devaiḥ parigṛhītābhūt pūjārtham /
S04bsu022_u:4117: adyāpi ca trāyatriṃśatsu deveṣu cūḍāmaho vartate /
S04bsu022_u:4120: punarapi bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - kathaṃ hi nāma pravrajyā ca kāśikāni vastrāṇi /
S04bsu022_u:4124: tatraiko devaputro divyaṃ rūpamantardhāpya lubdhakarūpeṇa kāṣāyavastraprāvṛto bodhisattvasya purato 'sthāt /
S04bsu022_u:4125: atha bodhisattvastametadavocat - sacenme tvaṃ mārṣā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dadyāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4130: tatastena lubdhakarūpiṇā devaputreṇa bodhisattvāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:4132: atha sa devaputro gauravajātastāni vastrāṇi ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham /
S04bsu022_u:4136: yadā ca bodhisattvena cūḍāṃ chittvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi prāvṛtāni,
S04bsu022_u:4137: tasmin samaye devaputraśatasahasrā hṛṣṭāstuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ paramapramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā hīhīkārakilikilāprakṣveḍitānirnādanirghoṣaśabdamakārṣuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4141_1: pāramuttāryānuttare kṣeme 'bhaye 'śoke nirūpadrave śive virajase 'mṛte dharmadhātau
S04bsu022_u:4143: tato 'ntaḥpurikābhiḥ kumāramapaśyantībhiḥ grīṣmikavārṣikahaimantikeṣu prāsādeṣvāsaneṣu ca gṛheṣu parimāgamāṇā yadā na paśyanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:4145: tatra kāścitstriyaḥ paramaśokārtā hā tātehi krandanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4166: kāścinmārutakampitā iva kadalyaḥ pravikampyamānā rudanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4168: kāścijjālotkṣiptamatsyā iva pṛthivyāṃ parivartyamānā rudanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4169: kāścinmūlachinnā iva vṛkṣāḥ sahasā dharaṇītale nipatya rudanti sma //
S04bsu022_u:4170: taṃ ca śabdaṃ rājā śrutvā śākyānāmantrayate sma - kimetaduccairantaḥpure śabdaḥ śrūyate?
S04bsu022_u:4171: śākyā vijñāya kathayanti sma - kumāraḥ kila mahārāja antaḥpure na dṛśyate /
S04bsu022_u:4176: mahāprajāpatyapi gautamī paridevamānā mahītale parivartate sma /
S04bsu022_u:4177: rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha kṣipraṃ māṃ mahārāja putreṇa samaṅginīṃ kuruṣveti //
S04bsu022_u:4182: te maṅgaladvāreṇa gacchantaḥ paśyanti sma antarāpathi puṣpavarṣaṃ prapatitam /
S04bsu022_u:4184: te svalpamantaraṃ gatvā taṃ devaputraṃ paśyanti sma bodhisattvasya kāśikavastrāṇi śirasi kṛtvā āgacchantam /
S04bsu022_u:4186: mā khalvanenaiṣāṃ vastrāṇāmarthe kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt /
S04bsu022_u:4190: tataste parasparamūcuḥ - mā tāvadbhoḥ sāhasaṃ mā kārṣṭa /
S04bsu022_u:4193: te chandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - he chandaka,
S04bsu022_u:4194: mā khalvanenaiva puruṣeṇa kāśikānāṃ vastrāṇāmarthāya kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt /
S04bsu022_u:4196: api tu anena kumārāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni /
S04bsu022_u:4198: atha sa devaputrastāni vastrāṇyubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham //
S04bsu022_u:4199: evaṃ ca te bhūyaśchandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - tatkiṃ manyase chandaka gacchāmo vayam?
S04bsu022_u:4203: evaṃ ca tenoktam - na tāvadahaṃ punarapi kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pravekṣyāmi,
S04bsu022_u:4208: tatastānyābharaṇāni cireṇa kālena bhadrikasya śākyakumārasya mahānāmno 'niruddhasya cābadhyanta sma /
S04bsu022_u:4211: yadā na kaścittāni dhārayituṃ śaknoti sma,
S04bsu022_u:4212: tadā mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā cintitamabhūt - yāvadahamimānyābharaṇāni paśyāmi,
S04bsu022_u:4215: tato mahāprajāpatī gautamī tānyābharaṇāni puṣkariṇyāṃ prakṣipati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4218: niṣkrāntu śūro yada vidu bodhisattvo nagaraṃ vibuddhaṃ kapilapuraṃ samagram /
S04bsu022_u:4219: manyanti sarve śayanagato kumāro anyonya hṛṣṭāḥ pramudita ālabhante // Lal_15.102 //
S04bsu022_u:4220: gopā vibuddhā tatha api istrigārā śayanaṃ nirīkṣī na ca dṛśi bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:4221: utkrośu mukto narapatino agāre hā vañcitāḥ smaḥ kahi gatu bodhisattvo // Lal_15.103 //
S04bsu022_u:4222: rājā śruṇitvā dharaṇitale nirasto utkrośu kṛtvā aho mama ekaputro /
S04bsu022_u:4223: so stemito hi jalaghaṭasaṃprasikto āśvāsayantī bahuśata śākiyānām // Lal_15.104 //
S04bsu022_u:4224: gopā śayāto dharaṇitale nipatya keśāṃ lunātī avaśiri bhūṣaṇāni /
S04bsu022_u:4225: aho subhāṣṭaṃ mama puri nāyakenā sarvapriyebhirnaciratu viprayogaḥ // Lal_15.105 //
S04bsu022_u:4226: rūpā surūpā vimalavicitritāṅgā acchā viśuddhā jagati priyā manāpā /
S04bsu022_u:4227: dhanyā praśastā divi bhuvi pūjanīyā kva tvaṃ gato 'si mama śayi chorayitvā // Lal_15.106 //
S04bsu022_u:4228: na pāsyi pānaṃ na ca madhu na pramādaṃ bhūmau śayiṣye jaṭamakuṭaṃ dhariṣye /
S04bsu022_u:4229: snānaṃ jahitvā vratatapa ācariṣye yāvanna drakṣye guṇadharu bodhisattvam // Lal_15.107 //
S04bsu022_u:4231: udyāna sarve aphala apatrapuṣpā hārā viśuddhā tamarajapāṃśutulyāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4232: veśmaṃ na śobhī aṭavi puraṃ prakāśaṃ yattena tyaktaṃ naravarapuṃgavena // Lal_15.108 //
S04bsu022_u:4233: hā gītavādyāḥ sumadhura mañjughoṣāḥ hā istrigārā vigalita bhūṣaṇābhiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4234: hā hemajālaiḥ parisphuṭamantarikṣaṃ na bhūyu drakṣye guṇadharaviprahīṇā // Lal_15.109 //
S04bsu022_u:4235: mātṛsvasā cā paramasukṛcchraprāptā āśvāsayāti ma rudahi śākyakanye /
S04bsu022_u:4236: pūrve ca uktaṃ naravarapuṃgavena kartāsmi loke jaramaraṇātpramokṣam // Lal_15.110 //
S04bsu022_u:4237: so cā maharṣī kuśalasahasra cīrṇaḥ ṣaḍ yojanāni pratigatu rātriśeṣe /
S04bsu022_u:4238: chandasya detī hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni chandā gṛhītvā kapilapuraṃ prayāhi // Lal_15.111 //
S04bsu022_u:4239: mātāpitaṇāṃ mama vacanena pṛcche gataḥ kumāro na ca puna śocayethā /
S04bsu022_u:4240: buddhitva bodhiṃ punarihamāgamiṣye dharmaṃ śruṇitvā bhaviṣyatha śāntacittāḥ // Lal_15.112 //
S04bsu022_u:4241: chando rudanto pratibhaṇi nāyakasya na me 'sti śaktirbalata parākramo vā /
S04bsu022_u:4242: haneyu mahyaṃ naravarajñātisaṃghāḥ chandā kva nīto guṇadharu bodhisattvo // Lal_15.113 //
S04bsu022_u:4243: mā tāhi chandā pratibhaṇi bodhisattvo tuṣṭā bhavitvā api mama jñātisaṃghāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4244: śāstārasaṃjñā tvayi sada bhāviṣyanti premeṇa mahyaṃ tvayamapi vartiṣyante // Lal_15.114 //
S04bsu022_u:4245: chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni udyānaprāpto naravarapuṃgavasya /
S04bsu022_u:4247: udyānapālaḥ pramuditu vegajāto ānandaśabdaṃ pratibhaṇi śākiyānām // Lal_15.115 //
S04bsu022_u:4248: ayaṃ kumāro hayavaru chandakaśca udyānaprāpto na ca puna śocitavyo /
S04bsu022_u:4249: rājā śraṇitvā parivṛtu śākiyebhiḥ udyānaprāpto pramuditu vegajāto // Lal_15.116 //
S04bsu022_u:4250: gopā viditvā dṛḍhamati bodhisattvaṃ no cāpi harṣī na ca gira śraddadhāti /
S04bsu022_u:4251: asthānametadvinigatu yatkumāro aprāpya bodhiṃ punariha āgameyā // Lal_15.117 //
S04bsu022_u:4252: dṛṣṭvā tu rājā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca utkrośu kṛtvā dharaṇitale nirasto /
S04bsu022_u:4253: hā mahya putrā sukuśalagītavādyā kva tvaṃ gato 'si vijahiya sarvarājyam // Lal_15.118 //
S04bsu022_u:4254: sādhū bhaṇāhi vacana mameha chandā kiṃ vā prayogaḥ kva ca gatu bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4255: kenātha nīto vivarita kena dvārā pūjā ca tasyā katha kṛta devasaṃghaiḥ // Lal_15.119 //
S04bsu022_u:4256: chando bhaṇātī śṛṇu mama pārthivendrā rātrau prasupte nagari sabālavṛddhe /
S04bsu022_u:4257: so mañjughoṣo mama bhaṇi bodhisattvo chandā dadāhi mama laghu aśvarājam // Lal_15.120 //
S04bsu022_u:4258: so bodhayāmi naragaṇi nārisaṃghaṃ suptā prasuptā na ca gira te śruṇanti /
S04bsu022_u:4259: so rodamāno dadi ahu aśvarājaṃ hanta vrajāhī hitakara yena kāmam // Lal_15.121 //
S04bsu022_u:4260: śakreṇa dvārā vivarita yantrayuktāḥ pālāścatasro hayacaraṇe śiliṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4261: ārūḍhi śūre pracalita trisahasrāḥ mārgo nabhe 'smin suvipula yena krānto // Lal_15.122 //
S04bsu022_u:4263: ābhā pramuktā vihatatamondhakārā puṣpā patiṃsū turiyaśatā raṇiṃṣū /
S04bsu022_u:4264: devāḥ staviṃsū tathapi hi cāpsarāṇi nabhasā prayāto parivṛtu devasaṃghaiḥ // Lal_15.123 //
S04bsu022_u:4265: chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni antaḥpure so upagatu rodamāno /
S04bsu022_u:4266: dṛṣṭvā tu gopā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca saṃmūrchayitvā dharaṇitale nirastā // Lal_15.124 //
S04bsu022_u:4267: udyukta sarvā suvipula nārisaṃghāḥ vāriṃ gṛhītvā snapayiṣu śākyakanyām /
S04bsu022_u:4268: mā haiva kālaṃ kariṣyati śokaprāptā dvābhyāṃ priyābhyāṃ bahu bhavi viprayogo // Lal_15.125 //
S04bsu022_u:4269: sthāmaṃ janitvā suduḥkhita śākyakanyā kaṇṭhe 'valambyā hayavaraaśvarāje /
S04bsu022_u:4270: anusmaritvā purimaka kāmakrīḍāṃ nānāpralāpī pralapati śokaprāptā // Lal_15.126 //
S04bsu022_u:4271: hā mahya prītijananā hā mama narapuṃgavā vimalacandramukhā /
S04bsu022_u:4272: hā mama surūparūpā hā mama varalakṣaṇā vimalatejadharā // Lal_15.127 //
S04bsu022_u:4273: hā mama aninditāṅgā sujāta anupūrvaudgatā asamā /
S04bsu022_u:4274: hā mama guṇāgradhāriṃ naramarūbhiḥ pūjitā paramakārūṇikā // Lal_15.128 //
S04bsu022_u:4276: hā mama sumāñjaghoṣā kalaviṅkarutasvarā madhurabrahmarutā // Lal_15.129 //
S04bsu022_u:4278: hā mama anantavarṇā guṇagaṇapratimaṇḍitā ṛṣigaṇaprītikarā // Lal_15.130 //
S04bsu022_u:4279: hā mama sujātajātā lumbinivana uttame bhramaragītarute /
S04bsu022_u:4280: hā mama vighuṣṭaśabdā divi bhuvi abhipūjitā vipulajñānadrumā // Lal_15.131 //
S04bsu022_u:4281: hā mama rasārasāgrā bimboṣṭhā kamalalocanā kanakanibhā /
S04bsu022_u:4283: hā mama sunāsa subhrū ūrṇābhru mukhāntare sthitā vimalā /
S04bsu022_u:4284: hā mama suvṛttaskandhā cāpodara eṇeyajaṅghavṛttakaṭī // Lal_15.133 //
S04bsu022_u:4287: iti tasya bhūṣaṇāni puṇyehi kṛtāni pārthive prītikarā // Lal_15.134 //
S04bsu022_u:4289: hā mahya puṣpagandhā antaḥpuri gītavāditairharṣakarā // Lal_15.135 //
S04bsu022_u:4290: hā kaṇṭhakā sujātā mama bhartu sahāyakastvayā kva nīto /
S04bsu022_u:4291: hā chandakā nikaruṇā na bodhayasi gacchamānake naravariṣṭhe // Lal_15.136 //
S04bsu022_u:4292: gacchatyayaṃ hitakaro ekā gira tasminnantari na bhasi kasmāt /
S04bsu022_u:4293: itu adya puravarāto gacchati naradamyasārathiḥ kāruṇikaḥ // Lal_15.137 //
S04bsu022_u:4294: katha vā gato hitakaro kena ca niṣkramito itu sa rājakulāt /
S04bsu022_u:4295: katamāṃ diśāmanugato dhanyā vanagulmadevatā yāsya sakhī // Lal_15.138 //
S04bsu022_u:4296: atiduḥkha mahya chandā nidhidarśiya netrauddhṛtā cakṣudadā /
S04bsu022_u:4298: tānapi jahitva nirgatu kiṃ punarima istrikāmaratim /
S04bsu022_u:4299: hā dhik priyairviyogo naṭaraṅgasvabhāvasaṃnibhā anityā // Lal_15.140 //
S04bsu022_u:4301: prāgeva tena bhaṇitaṃ nāsti jarāmaraṇasaṃskṛte kāści sakhā // Lal_15.141 //
S04bsu022_u:4303: buddhitva bodhivirajāṃ punarapi etū ihā puravareṃ asmin // Lal_15.142 //
S04bsu022_u:4305: sāśrukaṇṭha gira saṃprabhāṣate sādhu gopi niśṛṇohi me vacaḥ // Lal_15.143 //
S04bsu022_u:4306: rātriye rahasi yāmi madhyame sarvanārigaṇi saṃprasuptake /
S04bsu022_u:4307: so tadā ca śatapuṇyaudgato ālapeti mama dehi kaṇṭhakam // Lal_15.144 //
S04bsu022_u:4308: taṃ niśāmya vacanaṃ tadantaraṃ tubhya prekṣami śayāni suptikām /
S04bsu022_u:4309: uccaghoṣu ahu tatra muñcamī utthi gopi ayu yāti te priyo // Lal_15.145 //
S04bsu022_u:4311: devatā vacanu taṃ nirodhayi eka istri napi kāci budhyate /
S04bsu022_u:4312: rodamāna samalaṃkaritvanā aśvarāju dadamī narottame // Lal_15.146 //
S04bsu022_u:4313: kaṇṭhako hiṣati ugratejasvī krośamātru svaru tasya gacchatī /
S04bsu022_u:4314: no ca kaści śṛṇute purottame devatābhi osvāpanaṃ kṛtam // Lal_15.147 //
S04bsu022_u:4316: sā raṇī madhurabhīṣmaśobhanā no ca keci śṛṇuvanti mānuṣāḥ // Lal_15.148 //
S04bsu022_u:4317: puṣyayuktu abhu tasmi antare candrajyotiṣa nabhe pratisthitā /
S04bsu022_u:4318: devakoṭi gagane kṛtāñjalī onamanti śirasābhivandiṣū // Lal_15.149 //
S04bsu022_u:4320: kaṇṭhakasya caraṇāṃ kare nyasī padmakeśaraviśuddhanirmalam // Lal_15.150 //
S04bsu022_u:4322: ṣaḍvikāra dharaṇī prakampitā buddhakṣetra sphuṭa ābhanirmalā // Lal_15.151 //
S04bsu022_u:4323: śakra devaguruḥ śacīpatiḥ svāma dvāra vivarī tadantare /
S04bsu022_u:4324: devakoṭinayutaiḥ puraskṛto so vrajī amaranāgapūjito // Lal_15.152 //
S04bsu022_u:4325: saṃjñamātra iha jāti kaṇṭhako lokanāthu vahatī nabho 'ntare /
S04bsu022_u:4327: devadānavagaṇā saindrikāḥ ye vahanti sugatasya gacchataḥ // Lal_15.153 //
S04bsu022_u:4329: kaṇṭhakasya balu te dadantikāḥ muñci ghoṣu madhuraṃ manoramam // Lal_15.154 //
S04bsu022_u:4330: kaṇṭhakā vahahi lokanāyakaṃ śīghra śīghra ma janehi khedatām /
S04bsu022_u:4332: ekameka abhinandate suro vāhanaṃ smi ahu lokanāyake /
S04bsu022_u:4333: no ca kiṃcidapi deśu vidyate devakoṭicaraṇairna marditam // Lal_15.156 //
S04bsu022_u:4334: paśya kaṇṭhaka nabhontare imaṃ mārgu saṃsthitu vicitraśobhanam /
S04bsu022_u:4336: ena kaṇṭhaka śubhena karmaṇā trāyatriṃśabhavane sunirmito /
S04bsu022_u:4337: apsarai parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto divyakāmaratibhī ramiṣyase // Lal_15.158 //
S04bsu022_u:4338: sādhu gopi ma khu bhūyu rodahī tuṣṭa bhohi paramapraharṣitā /
S04bsu022_u:4339: drakṣase nacirato narottamaṃ bodhiprāptamamaraiḥ puraskṛtam // Lal_15.159 //
S04bsu022_u:4340: ye narāḥ sukṛtakarmakārakāḥ te na gopi sada roditavyakāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4341: so ca puṇyaśatatejaudgato harṣitavya na sa roditavyakaḥ // Lal_15.160 //
S04bsu022_u:4343: saptarātra bhaṇabhānu gopike sā viyūha napi śakya kṣepitum /
S04bsu022_u:4344: yā viyūha abhu tatra pārthive niṣkramanti naradevapūjite // Lal_15.161 //
S04bsu022_u:4345: lābha tubhya paramā acintiyā yaṃ tyupasthitu jage hitaṃkaro /
S04bsu022_u:4346: mahya saṃjñi svakameva vartate tvaṃ hi bheṣyasi yathā narottamaḥ // Lal_15.162 //
S04bsu022_u:4353: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaśchandako bodhisattvādhisthānena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāśca sarvasya cāntaḥpurasya sarvasya ca śākyagaṇasya śokavinodakathāmakārṣīt //
S04bsu022_u:4354_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lubdhakarūpāya devaputrāya kāśikāni vastrāṇi dattvā tasya
S04bsu022_u:4354_1: sakāśātkāṣāyāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā svayameva pravajyāṃ lokānuvartanāmupādāya sattvānukampāyai
S04bsu022_u:4355: atha bodhisattvo yenaiva śākyā brāhmaṇyā āśramastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:4356: sā bodhisattvaṃ vāsena bhaktena copanimantrayate sma /
S04bsu022_u:4357: tato bodhisattvaḥ padmāyā brāhmaṇyā āśramaṃ gacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4362: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo 'nupūrveṇa vaiśālīṃ mahānagarīmanuprāpto 'bhut //
S04bsu022_u:4363: tena khalu punaḥ samayenārāḍaḥ kālāpo vaiśālīmupanisṛtya prativasati sma mahatā śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ tribhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4364: sa śiṣyebhya ākiṃcanyāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4365: sa bodhisattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptaḥ śiṣyānāmantrayate sma - paśyata paśyata bho rūpamasyeti /
S04bsu022_u:4368: tato 'haṃ bhikṣavo yenārāḍaḥ kālāpastenopasaṃkramyārāḍa kālāpametadavocat - careyamahaṃ bho ārāḍe kālāpe brahmacaryam /
S04bsu022_u:4369: so 'vocat - cara bho gautama tathārūpeṇa dharmākhyāne yasmin śrāddhaḥ kulaputro 'lpakṛcchreṇājñāmārādhayati //
S04bsu022_u:4370: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - asti me chando 'sti vīryamasti smṛtirasti samādhirasti prajñā,
S04bsu022_u:4371: yannvahameko 'pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo vihareyaṃ tasyaiva dharmasya prāptaye sākṣātkriyāyai //
S04bsu022_u:4372: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo eko 'pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo viharannalpakṛcchreṇaivaṃ taṃ dharmamadhyavagacchan sākṣādakārṣam //
S04bsu022_u:4373: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo yenārāḍaḥ kālāpastenopasaṃkramyaitadavocat - etāvadbho tvayā ārāḍa dharmo 'dhigataḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ?
S04bsu022_u:4375: tamahamavocat - mayāpi bho eṣa dharmaḥ sākṣātkṛto 'dhigataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4376: so 'vocat - tena hi bho gautama yadahaṃ dharma jānāmi,
S04bsu022_u:4381: iti hi bhikṣava ārāḍaḥ kālāpaḥ paramayā pūjayā māṃ pūjayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4382: antevāsiṣu ca māṃ samānārthatayā sthāpayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:4384: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvārāḍasya dharmo na nairyāṇiko na niryāti,
S04bsu022_u:4387: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo yathābhirāmaṃ vaiśālyāṃ vihṛtya magadheṣu ca prakrānto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4388: so 'haṃ magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ rājagṛhaṃ nagaraṃ tadanusṛto yena ca pāṇḍavaḥ parvatarājastenopasaṃkrānto 'bhūvam /
S04bsu022_u:4390_0: tato 'haṃ kalyameva saṃnivāsya pātracīvaramādāya tapodadvāreṇa rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ
S04bsu022_u:4390_1: piṇḍāya prāvikṣat prāsādikenābhikrāntena pratikrāntena vyavalokitena saṃmiñjitena
S04bsu022_u:4391: tatra māṃ rājagṛhakā manuṣyā dṛṣṭvā vismitā abhūvan - kiṃ svidayaṃ brahmā bhaviṣyati śakro devānāmindra āhosvidvaiśravaṇo āhosvitkiṃcidgiridaivatam //
S04bsu022_u:4393: atha vimaladharo hyanantatejo svayamiha pravrajiyāna bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4394: śāntamanu dānta īryavanto viharati pāṇḍavaśailarājapārśve // Lal_16.1 //
S04bsu022_u:4395: rajani vigatu jñātva bodhisattvaḥ paramasudarśaniyaṃ nivāsayitvā /
S04bsu022_u:4396: pātra pratigṛhīya nīcamāno praviśati rājagṛhaṃ sapiṇḍapātram // Lal_16.2 //
S04bsu022_u:4398: naragaṇa tatha nāri prekṣamāṇo na ca bhavate kvaci tṛpti darśanena // Lal_16.3 //
S04bsu022_u:4399: vīthi racita ratnavastradhāryai avaśiriyā janu yāti pṛṣṭhato 'sya /
S04bsu022_u:4400: ko nu ayu adṛṣṭapūrvasattvo yasya prabhāya puraṃ vibhāti sarvam // Lal_16.4 //
S04bsu022_u:4401: upari sthihiya nāriṇāṃ sahasrā tathariva dvāri tathaiva vātayāne /
S04bsu022_u:4403: rathya bharita gehi śūnya kṛtvā naravaru prekṣiṣu te ananyakarmāḥ // Lal_16.5 //
S04bsu022_u:4404: na ca bhuyu krayavikrayaṃ karontī na ca puna sauṇḍa pibanti madyapānam /
S04bsu022_u:4405: na ca gṛhi na ca vīthiye ramante puruṣavarasya nirīkṣamāṇa rūpam // Lal_16.6 //
S04bsu022_u:4406: puruṣa tvaritu gacchi rājagehaṃ avaciṣu rāja sa bimbisāra tuṣṭo /
S04bsu022_u:4407: deva parama tubhya labdha lābhā svayamiha brahma pure carāti piṇḍam // Lal_16.7 //
S04bsu022_u:4408: keci avaci śakra devarājo apari bhaṇanti suyāma devaputraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4409: tatha api saṃtuṣitaṃ va nirmitaśca apari bhaṇanti sunirmiteṣu devaḥ // Lal_16.8 //
S04bsu022_u:4410: keci puna bhaṇanti candrasūryau tathapi ca rāhu baliśca vemacitrī /
S04bsu022_u:4411: keci puna bhaṇanti vācamevaṃ ayu so pāṇḍavaśailarājavāsī // Lal_16.9 //
S04bsu022_u:4412: vacanamimu śruṇitva pārthivo 'sau paramaudagramanā sthito gavākṣe /
S04bsu022_u:4413: prekṣati varasattva bodhisattvaṃ jvalatu śirīya sudhātukāñcanaṃ vā // Lal_16.10 //
S04bsu022_u:4414: piṇḍa dadiya rāja bimbisāraḥ puruṣamavocannirīkṣa kva prayātī /
S04bsu022_u:4415: dṛṣṭva girivaraṃ sa gacchamāno avaciṣu deva gataḥ sa śailapārśvam // Lal_16.11 //
S04bsu022_u:4416: rajani vigatu jñātva bimbisāro mahata janaiḥ parivārito narendraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4417: upagami pāṇḍavaśailarājamūle śiriya jvalantu tamadṛśāti śailam // Lal_16.12 //
S04bsu022_u:4419: dharaṇi vrajitu yāni oruhitvā paramasugaurava prekṣi bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:4420: meruriva yathā hyakampamāno nyasiya tṛṇāni niṣaṇṇa sostikena // Lal_16.13 //
S04bsu022_u:4421: śirasi caraṇi vandayitva rājā vividhakathāṃ samudāharitva vocat /
S04bsu022_u:4422: dadami tava upārdhu sarvarājyād rama iha kāmaguṇairahaṃ ca piṇḍam // Lal_16.14 //
S04bsu022_u:4423: prabhaṇati giri bodhisattva ślakṣṇaṃ dharaṇipate ciramāyu pālayasva /
S04bsu022_u:4424: ahamapi pravijahya rājyamiṣṭaṃ pravrajito nirapekṣi śāntihetoḥ // Lal_16.15 //
S04bsu022_u:4426: vipula dhana pratīccha nārisaṃghaṃ iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ // Lal_16.16 //
S04bsu022_u:4427: paramapramudito 'smi daśanātte avaciṣu sa māgadharāja bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:4428: bhavahi mama sahāyu sarvarājyaṃ ahu tava dāsyi prabhūta bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ // Lal_16.17 //
S04bsu022_u:4429: mā ca puna vane vasāhi śūnye ma bhuyu tṛṇeṣu vasāhi bhūmivāsam /
S04bsu022_u:4430: paramasukumāru tubhya kāyo iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ // Lal_16.18 //
S04bsu022_u:4431: prabhaṇati giri bodhisattva ślakṣṇaṃ akuṭila premaṇiyā hitānukampī /
S04bsu022_u:4432: svasti dharaṇipāla te 'stu nityaṃ na ca ahu kāmaguṇebhirarthiko 'smi // Lal_16.19 //
S04bsu022_u:4434: vidubhi vigarhita cāpyanārya kāmā jahita mayā yathā pakvakheṭapiṇḍam // Lal_16.20 //
S04bsu022_u:4436: kāma drumaphalā yathā patantī yathamiva abhrabalāhakā vrajanti /
S04bsu022_u:4437: adhruva capalagāmi mārutaṃ vā vikiraṇa sarvaśubhasya vañcanīyā // Lal_16.21 //
S04bsu022_u:4438: kāma alabhamāna dahyayante tatha api labdha na tṛpti vindayantī /
S04bsu022_u:4439: yada puna avaśasya bhakṣayante tada mahaduḥkha janenti ghora kāmāḥ // Lal_16.22 //
S04bsu022_u:4440: kāma dharaṇipāla ye ca divyā tatha api mānuṣa kāma ye praṇītā /
S04bsu022_u:4441: eku naru labheta sarvakāmāṃ na ca so tṛpti labheta bhūyu eṣan // Lal_16.23 //
S04bsu022_u:4442: ye tu dharaṇipāla śāntadāntā ārya anāśrava dharmapūrṇasaṃjñā /
S04bsu022_u:4443: prajñaviduṣa tṛpta te sutṛptā na ca puna kāmaguṇeṣu kāci tṛptiḥ // Lal_16.24 //
S04bsu022_u:4444: kāma dharaṇipāla sevamānā purima na vidyati koṭi saṃskṛtasya /
S04bsu022_u:4445: lavaṇajala yathā hi nārū pītvā bhuyu tṛṣa vardhati kāma sevamāne // Lal_16.25 //
S04bsu022_u:4446: api ca dharaṇipāla paśya kāyaṃ adhruvamasāraku duḥkhayantrametat /
S04bsu022_u:4447: navabhi vraṇamukhaiḥ sadā sravantaṃ na mama narādhipa kāmachandarāgaḥ // Lal_16.26 //
S04bsu022_u:4448: ahamapi vipulāṃ vijahya kāmāṃ tathapi ca istrisahasra darśanīyāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:4449: anabhiratu bhaveṣu nirgato 'haṃ paramaśivāṃ varabodhi prāptukāmaḥ // Lal_16.27 //
S04bsu022_u:4451: katama diśi kuto gato 'si bhikṣo kva ca tava janma kva te pitā kva mātā /
S04bsu022_u:4453: kṣatriya atha brāhmaṇo 'tha rājā parikatha bhikṣu yadī na bhārasaṃjñā // Lal_16.28 //
S04bsu022_u:4455: śratu ti dharaṇipāla śākiyānāṃ kapilapuraṃ paramaṃ suṛddhisphītam /
S04bsu022_u:4456: pitu mama śuddhodaneti nāmnā tanu ahu pravrajito guṇābhilāṣī // Lal_16.29 //
S04bsu022_u:4458: sādhu tava sudṛṣṭadarśanaṃ te yanu tava janma vayaṃ pi tasya śiṣyāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4459: api ca mama kṣamasva āśayenā yamapi nimantritu kāmavītarāgo // Lal_16.30 //
S04bsu022_u:4460: yadi tvaya anuprāptu bhoti bodhiḥ tada mama seti bhoti dharmasvāmim /
S04bsu022_u:4461: api ca mama purā sulabdha lābhā mama vijite vasasīha yatsvayaṃbho // Lal_16.31 //
S04bsu022_u:4462: punarapi caraṇāni vandayitvā kṛtva pradakṣiṇu gauraveṇa rājā /
S04bsu022_u:4463: svakajanaparivārito narendraḥ punarapi rājagṛhaṃ anupraviṣṭaḥ // Lal_16.32 //
S04bsu022_u:4464: magadhapuri praveśi lokanātho vihariya śāntamanā yathābhiprāyam /
S04bsu022_u:4465: arthu kariya devamānuṣāṇāṃ upagami tīru nirañjanā narendraḥ // Lal_16.33 //
S04bsu022_u:4471: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena rudrako nāma rāmaputro rājagṛhaṃ nāma mahānagaramupanisṛtya viharati sma mahatā śiṣyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saptabhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4472: sa tebhyo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4473: adrākṣīt khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputraṃ saṃghegaṇinaṃ gaṇācāryaṃ jñātamabhīpsitaṃ bahujanapūjitaṃ paṇḍitasaṃmatam /
S04bsu022_u:4474: dṛṣṭvā cāsyaitadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvapi rudrako rāmaputraḥ saṃghegaṇī gaṇācāryaḥ jñāto 'bhīpsito bahujanapūjitaḥ paṇḍitasaṃmataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4476: naiṣa mamāntike viśiṣṭasaṃjño bhavennāpi pratyakṣajñānena jñāto bhavennāpi saṃskṛtānāṃ sāśravānāṃ sopādānānāṃ dhyānasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ doṣo datto bhavet /
S04bsu022_u:4477: yannvahaṃ tathārupamupāyamupasaṃdarśayeyaṃ yenaite ca pratyakṣā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4478: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca samāpattyārambaṇānāṃ laukikasamādhīnāmaniḥsaraṇatā darśitā bhavet /
S04bsu022_u:4479: yannvahaṃ rudrakasya rāmaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya svasamādhiguṇaviśeṣodbhāvanārthaṃ śiṣyatvamabhyupagamya saṃskṛtasamādhīnāmasāratāmupadarśayeyamiti //
S04bsu022_u:4480: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattva idamarthavaśamadhikṛtya yena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:4481: upasaṃkramya rudrakaṃ rāmaputrametadavocat - kaste mārṣa śāstā,
S04bsu022_u:4483: ityevamukte rudrako rāmaputro bodhisattvamevamāha - na me mārṣa kaścicchāstā /
S04bsu022_u:4484: api tu khalu punaḥ svayameva mayedaṃ samyagadhigatamiti /
S04bsu022_u:4487: bodhisattva āha - labhemahi vayaṃ bhavataḥ sakāśādavavādānuśāsanīyasya samādhermārgam?
S04bsu022_u:4490: tato bodhisattva ekāntaṃ gatvā paryaṅkamābhujyopaviśati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4491_0: samanantaropaviṣṭasya ca bodhisattvasya puṇyaviśeṣeṇa ca jñānaviśeṣeṇa ca pūrvasucaritacaryāphalaviśeṣeṇa
S04bsu022_u:4491_1: ca sarvasamādhiparicayaviśeṣeṇa ca dhyānapramukhāni sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi
S04bsu022_u:4491_2: samāpattiśatānyāmukhībhavanti sma sākārāṇi soddeśāni yathāpi taccittavaśavartitvāt /
S04bsu022_u:4492: atha ca bodhisattvaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan utthāyāsanādyena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:4493: upasaṃkramya rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha astyanyo 'pi mārṣa kaściduttare naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattermārgaḥ?
S04bsu022_u:4495: tato bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - na khalu rudrakasyaivāsti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā /
S04bsu022_u:4496: mamāpyasti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā /
S04bsu022_u:4497: atha bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha - mayāpyeṣa mārṣa dharmo 'dhigato yatra tvaṃ niryātaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4499: tvaṃ cāhaṃ cemaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharāva iti /
S04bsu022_u:4502: bodhisattva āha - naiṣa mārṣa mārgo nirvṛtaye na virāgāya na nirodhāya nopaśamāya nābhijñāyai na saṃbodhaye na śrāmaṇāya na brāhmaṇāya na nirvāṇāya saṃvartate //
S04bsu022_u:4503: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakasya rāmaputrasya saśiṣyasyāvarjanīkṛtva yāvadalamiti kṛtvā prakrāmat - alaṃ mamāneneti //
S04bsu022_u:4504: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrake rāmaputre brahmacaryaṃ caranti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4505: teṣāmetadabhūt - yasya khalu vayamarthāya dīrgharātraṃ ghaṭāmahe udyujyāmahe,
S04bsu022_u:4506: na ca śaknumo 'ntaṃ vā paryantaṃ cādhigantum,
S04bsu022_u:4513: evaṃ vimṛṣya pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrakarāmaputrasakāśādapakramya bodhisattvamanvabadhnan //
S04bsu022_u:4514: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya magadheṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmat sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4515: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāntarācca rājagṛhasya antarācca gayāyā yo 'nyatamo gaṇa utsavaṃ karoti sma,
S04bsu022_u:4516: tena ca gaṇena bodhisattvo 'bhinimantrito 'bhūt vāsena bhaktena ca sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4517: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ gayā tāmanusṛtya tāmanuprāpto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4518: tatra khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ prahāṇārthī viharati sma gayāśīrṣe parvate /
S04bsu022_u:4519: tatrāsya viharatastisra upamāḥ pratibhānti sma aśrutapūrvā anabhijñātapūrvāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4521: ye kecitte khalvapi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo 'navakṛṣṭakāyā viharanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4523: yāpi caiṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānatā,
S04bsu022_u:4525: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
S04bsu022_u:4526: atha tarhi abhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:4527: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo 'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇīmudake prakṣipya mathnīyāt,
S04bsu022_u:4529: evameva ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo 'navakṛṣṭakāyā anavakṛṣṭacittāśca viharanti,
S04bsu022_u:4530: yāpyeṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānaṃ tadapyanupaśāntam /
S04bsu022_u:4531: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
S04bsu022_u:4533: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamā upamā pratibhāti sma //
S04bsu022_u:4535: bhūyaścāsyaitadabhūt - ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
S04bsu022_u:4536: yāpi teṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ kartavyaṃ yāvajjyotiṃ paryeṣata iti /
S04bsu022_u:4537: sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya sthale sthāpayitvā ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ mathnīyāt,
S04bsu022_u:4539: evameva ye ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ pūrvavatkāryaṃ yāvadabhavyā uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:4540: iyaṃ dvitīyā upamā pratibhāti sma pūrvamaśrutā cāvijñātā ca //
S04bsu022_u:4541: punaraparaṃ ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bhavantaḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
S04bsu022_u:4545: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
S04bsu022_u:4546: atha khalu punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:4547: tadyathāpi nāma iha syātpuruṣo 'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiḥ paryeṣamāṇaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4548: sa śuṣkaṃ kāṣṭhamādāya śuṣkāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ sthale pratiṣṭhāpya mathnīyāt,
S04bsu022_u:4550: evameva ya ime bhavantaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedayanta iti /
S04bsu022_u:4551: atha ca punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:4552: iyaṃ tṛtīyā upamā pratibhāti sma aśrutapūrvā ca avijñātapūrvā ca //
S04bsu022_u:4553: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - ahaṃ khalvetarhi kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyo viharāmi vyapakṛṣṭacittaśca /
S04bsu022_u:4554: yāpi me kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ yāvattadapi me upaśāntam /
S04bsu022_u:4555: kiṃ cāpi ahamātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāmiti peyālaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedmi /
S04bsu022_u:4557: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ gayāyāṃ vihṛtya gayāśīrṣe parvate jaṅgāvihāramanucaṃkramyamāṇo yenorubilvā senāpatigrāmakastadanusṛtastadanuprāpto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4558: tatrādrākṣīnnadīṃ nairañjanāmacchodakāṃ sūpatīrthāṃ prāsādikaiśca drumagulmairalaṃkṛtāṃ samantataśca gocaragrāmām /
S04bsu022_u:4559: tatra khalvapi bodhisattvasya mano 'tīva prasannamabhūt - samo batāyaṃ bhūmipradeśo ramaṇīyaḥ pratisaṃlayanānurūpaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4563_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - pañcakaṣāyakāle 'hamiha jambudvīpe 'vatīrṇo
S04bsu022_u:4582_0: iha ca kecitparatra manyante svargāpavargāvasmākametebhyo nirvartsyeta iti mithyāmārgaprayātā
S04bsu022_u:4582_2: tādṛśaṃ vratatapoviśeṣamālabheyaṃ yathā sarvaparapravādinaśca nigṛhītāḥ syuḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4584: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ dhyānaviśeṣopadarśanādāvarjanaṃ kuryāmiti //
S04bsu022_u:4585: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattva evaṃ cintayitvā ṣaḍvarṣikaṃ mahāghoraṃ vratatapaḥsuduṣkarātsuduṣkarāṃ duṣkaracaryāmālabhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:4589: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā,
S04bsu022_u:4594: sa caturthadhyānamādita eva samāpadyamāna āśvāsapraśvāsānuparodhayati saṃnirodhayati /
S04bsu022_u:4595: akalpaṃ tad dhyānamavikalpamaniñjanamapanītamaspandanaṃ sarvatrānugataṃ ca sarvatra cāniśritam /
S04bsu022_u:4596: na ca tad dhyānaṃ jātu kenacitsamāpannaṃ pūrvaṃ śaiṣyeṇa vā aśaiṣyeṇa vā pratyekabuddhena (Vaidya 184)
S04bsu022_u:4599: ākāśamaspharaṇamakaraṇamavikaraṇaṃ tacca sarvaṃ spharatīti hyākāśasamaṃ tad dhyānam /
S04bsu022_u:4601_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyāścaryasaṃdarśanārthaṃ tīrthikānāṃ ca darpanirghātanārthaṃ
S04bsu022_u:4601_1: parapravādināṃ ca nigrahārthaṃ devānāṃ cāvarjanārthamucchedaśāśvatavādināṃ ca sattvānāṃ
S04bsu022_u:4602: niṣadya ca svakāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇīte sma,
S04bsu022_u:4604: tato me bhikṣavo haimantikāsvaṣṭakarātriṣu tathā kāyaṃ nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4606: bhūmau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4607: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣo durbalataraṃ puruṣaṃ grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣpīḍayet,
S04bsu022_u:4608: evameva bhikṣava imaṃ kāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4610: bhūbhau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4611: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahamāsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyam /
S04bsu022_u:4612: tato me bhikṣava āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyato mukhato nāsikātaścāśvāsapraśvāsā upaniruddhāvabhūtām /
S04bsu022_u:4614: tadyathāpi nāma karmāragagayā mathyamānāyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati,
S04bsu022_u:4615: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikābhyāmāśvāsapraśvāsāvuparuddhāvabhūtāṃ śrotachidrābhyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati sma //
S04bsu022_u:4616: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūya āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyamiti /
S04bsu022_u:4619: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ puruṣaḥ kuṇḍayā śaktyā śiraḥkapālamupahanyād,
S04bsu022_u:4620: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikāśrotreṣūparuddheṣu āśvāsapraśvāsā urdhvaṃ śiraḥkapālamupanighnanti sma //

S04bsu022_u:4955: tatra devatābhirurubilvāsenāpatigrāmake nandikagrāmikaduhituḥ sujātāyā ārocitamabhūdardharātrasamaye - yadarthaṃ tvaṃ mahāyajñaṃ yajase tasmādvratāduttīrṇaḥ saḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4957: tvayā ca pūrve praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam - mama bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta iti /
S04bsu022_u:4959: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sujātā nandikagrāmaduhitā teṣāṃ devatānāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā śīghraṃ gosahasrasya kṣīrātsaptakṛtsāroddhṛtādagryamojomaṇḍaṃ gṛhṇīte sma /
S04bsu022_u:4961: bhinavaistaṇḍulairabhinavāyāṃ sthālyāmabhinavāṃ cullīmupalipya tadbhojanaṃ sādhayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4962: tasmiṃśca sādhyamāne imāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante sma - tasmin khalvapi kṣīre śrīvatsasvastikanandyāvartapadmavardhamānādīni maṅgalyāni saṃdṛśyante sma /

S04bsu022_u:4980: sujātā āha - gacchottare sa eva brāhmaṇaḥ,

S04bsu022_u:4990: atha bodhisattvastadbhojanaṃ pratigṛhya sujātāṃ grāmikaduhitarametadavocat - iyaṃ bhagini suvarṇapātrī /

S04bsu022_u:5007: tatra bodhisattvo niṣadya yāvadarthaṃ taṃ madhupāyasaṃ paribhuṅkte sma sujātāyā grāmikaduhituranukampāmupādāya /
S04bsu022_u:5008: paribhujya ca tāṃ suvarṇapātrīmanapekṣo vāriṇi prākṣipati sma /
S04bsu022_u:5009: kṣiptamātrāṃ ca tāṃ sāgaro nāgarājaścittikārabahumānajāto gṛhītvā svabhavanābhimukhaḥ prasthito 'bhut pūjārheti kṛtvā /
S04bsu022_u:5010: atha daśaśatanayanaḥ puraṃdaro garuḍarūpamabhinirmāya vajratuṇḍo bhūtvā sāgarasya nāgarājasyāntikāttāṃ suvarṇapātrīṃ hartumārabdhaḥ /

S04bsu022_u:5021: ṣaḍvarṣa vrata uttaritva bhagavān evaṃ matiṃ cintayan so 'haṃ dhyānaabhijñajñānabalavānevaṃ kṛśāṅgo 'pi san /
S04bsu022_u:5022: gaccheyaṃ drumarājamūlaviṭapaṃ sarvajñatāṃ buddhituṃ no me syādanukampitā hi janatā evaṃ bhavet paścimā // Lal_18.23 //

S04bsu022_u:5024: mā haivetvarapuṇya devamanujā lūhena jñānekṣiṇo no śaktā siya budhyanāya amṛtaṃ kāyena te durbalāḥ // Lal_18.24 //

S04bsu022_u:8343: prasannācitto 'tha vadennamo 'rhate tasmādidaṃ śreṣṭhataraṃ ca puṇyam // Lal_27.4 //
S04bsu022_u:8344: buddhā bhaveyuryadi sarvasattvā tāṃ pūjayedyaśca yathaiva pūrvam /
S04bsu022_u:8345: divyaiśca puṣpairatha mānurṣairvaraiḥ kalpānanekāṃ bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ // Lal_27.5 //
S04bsu022_u:8346: yaścaiva saddharmavilopakātle tyaktvā svakāye ca tathaiva jīvitam /
S04bsu022_u:8347: vadyādahorātramidaṃ hi sūtraṃ viśiṣyate puṇyamidaṃ hi tasmāt // Lal_27.6 //
S04bsu022_u:8348: yasyepsitaṃ pūjayituṃ vināyakāṃ pratyekabuddhāṃśca tathaiva śrāvakāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:8349: dṛḍhaṃ samutpādya sa bodhicitta idaṃ sadā sūtravaraṃ dadhātu // Lal_27.7 //
S04bsu022_u:8351: gṛhe sthitastasya tathāgataḥ sadā tiṣṭhedidaṃ yatra hi sūtraratnam // Lal_27.8 //
S04bsu022_u:8352: pratibhāṃ sa prāpnoti śubhāmanantāṃ ekaṃ padaṃ vakṣyati kalpakoṭī /
S04bsu022_u:8353: na vyañjanā bhraśyati nāpi cārthā dadyācca yaḥ sūtramida parebhyaḥ // Lal_27.9 //
S04bsu022_u:8354: anuttaro 'sau naranāyakānāṃ sattvo na kaścitsadṛśo 'sya vidyate /
S04bsu022_u:8356: bhavetsamudreṇa samaśca so 'kṣayaḥ śrutvā hi yo dharmamimaṃ prapadyate // Lal_27.10 //
S04bsu022_u:8365: ye dharma hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu022_u:8366: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
